betterquesting.name: I Wish You Wood
betterquesting.desc:
Things get dangerous really quickly in Craft of Titans.  You will want a base set up before the first nightfall.  But don't worry, I will take care of that part.  Just start gathering some materials.

§3Pro Tip:  Right Clicking on any solid block with your Starter House kit will erect a small base, complete with mining tunnel and bed. Don't worry about spacing, the Kit will clear the necessary space to fit your home.  Keep in mind, this base should be considered very temporary... as the walls a simple wood, and won't stand up to the incoming onslaught of enemies (or their dynamite).

betterquesting.name: Cobble Gobble
betterquesting.desc: Many recipes in Craft of Titans have been made more realistic.  Who makes a furnace with only 8 blocks?  Who makes a chest with no latch?

betterquesting.name: Tools Of The Trade
betterquesting.desc: Unfortunately there has been a recall on the Tinker's Construct Workbench tables.  You will be able to trade your Tinker's Construct workbench in at your local Crafting Table for an  updated table that functions the same way.

betterquesting.name: Treated Unfairly
betterquesting.desc: The harsh climate in Craft of Titans means that many of the items we would normally make out of regular wood, must be treated to withstand moisture, heat, and ectoplasm.  Since you won't have the means to make treated wood for a little bit, I have prepared a few chests for you.   Make them count.

betterquesting.name: You Are Gonna Have a Blast
betterquesting.desc:
Steel is much stronger than Iron, and will be the primary material of choice in many recipes.   Only the Blast Furance is capable of creating the heat necessary to process steel at this altitude, so prepare to have it running almost constantly.  



§3Pro Tip:  You can make the normal Crude Blast Furnace, which is slow and can't be automated.  Or you can make the advanced Blast Furnace for only a few materials more.  The Advanced Blast Furnace can be automated and also upgraded to be 3x faster.


This is the quest for the Crude Furnace.  For the Advanced Furnace, see the quest adjacent to this.  You will only be able to complete one quest.  But you can make either furnace whenever you choose.

§4
You will need to click on the final 3x3x3 form of the furnace with the Engineer's Hammer to create the multiblock structure.  If you do not have the materials to create the Engineer's Hammer, you may be able to earn one as a reward from other quests.

betterquesting.name: Im In Love Wit the Coke Oven
betterquesting.desc:
In the harsh climate of the Craft of The Titans world, many wood elements must be treated in order to withstand the moisture and heat elements.  You would be wise to make a Coke Oven top priority.  The Creosote oil is vital in the crafting of treated wood, and the Coke nuggets are great fuel.





§3Pro Tip:  The Engineer's Hammer is required to finalize the Coke Oven build.  However, if you have already found one in a local village, the glass bottles are great for storing creosote.

betterquesting.name: Hit the Road Jack
betterquesting.desc: There are three important goals for your first few days/nights.  Coke Oven, Blast Fuirnace, and Base Defense.

betterquesting.name: Balls of Steel
betterquesting.desc: You will find that most machines in this modpack require steel in their make up.  You will keep a supply on hand for those pinches, as it's not the fastest process to make.

betterquesting.name: Blaster? I barely know her!
betterquesting.desc:
Steel is much stronger than Iron, and will be the primary material of choice in many recipes.   Only the Blast Furance is capable of creating the heat necessary to process steel at this altitude, for now, so prepare to have it running almost constantly.  



§e§3Pro Tip:  The Advanced Blast Furnace can be automated and also upgraded to be 3x faster.

Once you have built a 3x3 structure, place the hopper on the top middle block.  Provide RF power to the top of the PreHeater towers with conduit or connectors. Click the structure with the Engineer's Hammer to create the multiblock.  You will need the same hammer to make the Iron and Copper Plates.  If you do not have the materials to craft the Engineer's Hammer you may be able to recieve a hammer as reward from other quests.

betterquesting.name: Home On The Range
betterquesting.desc: Trees will be a valuable resource in your time in Craft Of The Titans.  Both wood and charcoal will be in high demand.

betterquesting.name: Brain Power
betterquesting.desc: O-oooooooooo AAAAE-A-A-I-A-U-JO-oooooooooooo AAE-O-A-A-U-U-A-E-eee-ee-eee AAAAE-A-E-I-E-A-JO-ooo-oo-oo-oo EEEEO-A-AAA-AAAA

betterquesting.name: Blame it on the Rain
betterquesting.desc:
You have heard word of a slippery Titan appearing near the shore areas.  Since you have cleared out the beginning quests, it's a good time to take a detour to wipe this scourge from the Oceans and keep the lines of shipping open with your home world.§6 Summon and defeat the Water Guardian.
IMPORTANT:  Completing this quest will allow you access to the Generating Power tab of quests.

betterquesting.name: Automate All The Things
betterquesting.desc: Using a redstone clock over the faucet of your smeltery drains, and a hopper under the casting table, will allow you to automate your ore processing.

betterquesting.name: Dirty Drawers
betterquesting.desc: It will be a little while before you get your Applied Energistics storage system.  Lets set up some storage in the mean time.

betterquesting.name: Drawer Control To Major Tom
betterquesting.desc: The drawer controller will act as a depository for all drawers connected within a 12 block radius (in all directions).  You can hook up a chest and conduit system to filter all of your items into the correct drawers, if you choose.

betterquesting.name: Starting The Pain Train with Rain
betterquesting.desc:
§c**Defeating This Titan Will Unlock New Quest Lines**

§fIt is time to take on what may very well be your first Titan in this new land.  This is not a task to be taken lightly.  Some Titans are big, small, fast, or slow... but they all have tricks up their sleeves.  Be weary when trying to "cheese" Titan fights, as this can cause them to despawn, forcing you to resummon and fight them again.

betterquesting.name: Ol McDonald Had a Farm
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: By Forge, I Tink He's Got It
betterquesting.desc: To make the more complex tools and weapons from Tinker's Construct you will need a tool forge.

betterquesting.name: Tanks For All The Help
betterquesting.desc: There are many ways to pump fluid into the smeltery or the smeltery fuel resevoir.  The easiest is the EnderIO Fluid Tank, as it requires no additional pipes.

betterquesting.name: The Earth Shall Fight Back
betterquesting.desc:
§9§c**Defeating this Titan Will Open New Quest Lines**

§fAnother Titan stands in your way.  Your recent blacksmithing of ores and minerals has caught the attention ot the Earth Guardian.  In order to progress further, you will need to make sure he no longer poses a problem.
§6Tip: Summon and defeat the Earth Guardian.

betterquesting.name: The Earth Is My Turf
betterquesting.desc: The Earth Guardian will do some destrutive damage to blocks as it attempts to trap you.  Make sure to fight him far from your base.

betterquesting.name: Honing Your Stab Stab Skills
betterquesting.desc:
If you havent already, you are STRONGLY advised to make sure the outside of your base is fortified with spikes, motes, trap doors, or whatever else may help against the onslaught that is headed your way VERY SOON. §l§n§d Bloodmoons happen every few nights!

Pro Tip:  The turrets in this pack have been altered to be more efficient in order to deal with the enhanced AI and all out chaos that is Craft Of The Titans.  DO NOT delay in fortifying your base, or you will have a difficult time.  §aThese Disposable turrets are a great start at defending against the Bloodmoon craziness.  Whats the ammo?       
cobblestone
planks
dirt
stone
clay
gravel
sand
grass
sandstone
ice
snow
nether_brick
rotten_flesh
netherrack
§6 Here's some dirt to start you off with.

betterquesting.name: Pump It Up!
betterquesting.desc: Providing your base camp with a steady flow of lava can be helpful for many reasons.  Using the mod Ranged Pumps, you can place a pump in the Nether, over a lava lake, and suck the lava into an Ender Tank, which will be connected to a storage tank back home.

betterquesting.name: The Sword In The Stone
betterquesting.desc: This pack is balanced around your ability to dual wield.  And that doesn't always imply you should be using two swords.  Consider a sword and shield... as shields not only block damage, but some also have ridiculous Knockback and Thorns enchants.  Or consider wielding a helpful spell in your left hand, and a sword in the other.  The options are vast.

betterquesting.name: Balls of Steel
betterquesting.desc: §fYou will need to strengthen your resolve and your physical stature in order to deal with the monstrosities that will be in your way going forward.  You will occassioanlly find heart crystals and heart cannisters as lootbag rewards or mob drops.  §6Combine 9 of the Heart Crysals to form one Cannister.  Using a cannister will permanently increase your maximum health.  §fYou can achieve DOUBLE your current health, for 30 full hearts.  Couple that with the natural absorption shield that is available later in the game, and you may actually stand a chance.

betterquesting.name: Iron Chef
betterquesting.desc:
There are multiple tiers of furnaces that will speed up your basic processing tasks.  Simply surround a basic furnace with Iron to upgrade your furnace to a faster and more capable version.

Chests also follow a similar tier style; surrounding them with the corresponding ingots will increase their capacity.

betterquesting.name: The Quickest Route From A To B
betterquesting.desc:
BREAK TIME! -  Well, not really a break, more of a side mission.  This is not a linear quest progression pack.  You are allowed... no... ENCOURAGED to move around to different quest topics in order to progress at an even pace in all areas.  Sticking to one topic at a time, may leave you completing early game quests well after they were helpful.

§6For now though, stop over to the Ars Kicking Magica tab.  It is important that you pick up your first spell, the Magic Light.  Place it on your hotbar, and get into the habit of using it instead of normal torches.  This will allow you to level up your magic proficiency without even knowing it.  This will help even more when you go back to finish the Ars Magica quests later, and already have a few magic levels under your belt.

betterquesting.name: Tip Intermission
betterquesting.desc:
This quest pack is not meant to be linear.  In order to give yourself the best combinations of armor, abilities, skills, and resources it is highly recommended that you visit each tab of the quest book, to map out what quests you can comnplete soon, and what quests you must wait for.

§6Some Key Examples:
§fStopping by the Ars Kicking Magicka quest tab and completing the first few quests will unlock some helpful features such as conjured Magelight.  This will also give you a headstart at levelling up your magic level before you return to focus on that mod later.

Checking out the Taking Flight tab will get you into your own Airship sooner than later.

betterquesting.name: Pepper Pots and Peter Pans
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: It's a Little Dry
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Food For Thought
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Oh Yay... Seed Evolving Is Back
betterquesting.desc: You will NOT be required to analyze or evolve seeds to 10/10/10.  However, care packages to send home in exchange for valuable end game items will be much easier to obtain if you have strong crops later.

betterquesting.name: Too Many Cooks In The Kitchen
betterquesting.desc:
Ever have a pantry full of food and dread having to flip through NEI to find out what you can actuallly make?  Cooking for Blockheads removes that struggle.  Constructing a "kitchen" will provide you with food storage, water source, cooking tools, and more at your fingertips.  


§3Pro Tip:  Clicking on the Cooking Table of your Kitchen will provide you a list of all food items you can craft with the items currently in your inventory, including the storage blocks attached to the kitchen (Refridgerators, cabinets, and chests attached to the kitchen will be included)

betterquesting.name: I'll Have One With Sprinkles
betterquesting.desc:
An Irrigation system will make it so that you do not require a water source at ground level in your farm.  The Sprinklers also increase the growth rate of plants in a 3 meter radius around them (7x7).  The effect of the sprinklers stack.

§3Pro Tip:  Using too many sprinklers in a small area can cause heavy lag.  You are strongly urged to replace them with Growth Accelerators (obtained from loot bags) when possible.

betterquesting.name: Alloy There Matey!
betterquesting.desc: Alloyed metals will be very important in Craft Of The Titans.  You will find they are used in more recipes that you may have recalled.

betterquesting.name: Lets Take It Up A Notch
betterquesting.desc: It's time to get serious about our farm.  From automating a tree farm for wood and charcoal... to using Mystical Agriculture to provide ores and resources.

betterquesting.name: Sag Millionaire
betterquesting.desc:
EnderIO Sag Mills provide an ease of operation not found in many mods because of their built in ability to push and pull items from their inventories.

§3Pro Tip:  Using Flint in your sag mill will increase the yield of your ores and their secondary outputs.  Using Dark Steel balls will increase the yield even greater.

betterquesting.name: Actually All The Additions
betterquesting.desc:
The Atomic Reconstructor is the Heart of the Actually Additions mod.  It will take basic resources and reconstruct them into more useful building materials that you will find used in many recipes throughout Craft Of The Titans.  You will find yourself using this machine throughout the rest of the pack.

§3Pro Tip:  Some of the set ups for these machines are more easily understood when referring to their in game manuals.

betterquesting.name: Portable Power
betterquesting.desc:
Power Cells allow you to remotely transfer energy from one place to another.  Similar to Tesseracts, but with no item or fluid capabilities.  Placing one Power Cell on your RF Storage Block and another on the machine that requires power, then linking them with the Power Cell Cards will allow the transfer of RF.  Higher level Power Cells allow for higher amounts of RF transfer and storage.  Multiple Power Cells can be fed from a single source if more than one Power Cell card is programmed for that source.

§3Pro Tip:  Power Cells and Ender Chests are great ways to run your automated farms without having conduits and pipes running all over the place.

betterquesting.name: Slice, Splice, and Bind?
betterquesting.desc: Many of the materials needed for EnderIO machines require technology that "taps" into the mind of the foes you encounter.  From the Zombie Logic Controller to the Enticing Crystals, you will often be asked to combine the biological with the technological in order to create new advanced equipment.  The Slice and Splice is a key part of this process.

betterquesting.name: Rocket Fuel, Shaken, Not Stirred
betterquesting.desc: The Vat will be used to make a variety of fuels and fluids.  From Nutrient Distillation to power items like the EnderIO Inventory Panel and Killer Joe... to Rocket Fuel used in the creation of Airship Propellant.

betterquesting.name: Mystical Agriculturel You Say
betterquesting.desc:
Mystical Agriculture is an extremely powerful system of resoure crops.  You can grow anything from Iron Ore to Wither Skeleton heads.  Your access to growth accelerators is going to be limited, as they are only available in Dungeons, Loot Bags, and Titan Rune trade ins.

§2§3Pro Tip:  Growth Accelerators are placed underneath the plants they empower to grow.  The number of Growth Accelerators that will stack their effects under each plant is seemingly endless.  As with any large automated builds, be weary of lag that can be caused by too many machines in a small area.

betterquesting.name: Canola Come Out To Play?
betterquesting.desc: Not unlike many other mods in this pack, Actually Additions has it's niche fuel source and food products.  This quest chain will not force you down that path, but these rewards should get you started if you should choose to experiment.

betterquesting.name: Might Morphin Empowered Ranger
betterquesting.desc: The Empowerer is like an advanced version of the Reconstructor, and will allow you to further empower items used in end game crafting recipes across the pack.

betterquesting.name: Stay On Your Grind
betterquesting.desc:
The benefits of the Minefactory Grinder over other killing mechanisms, is that it automatically ignores baby animals.  Obvisouly this is helpful on a farm, since you do not want to kill an animal until it is fully grown, and will therefore drop meat and hides. This is exactly what you need to finish automating your livestock breeding and butchering setup.

§aTip:  §6The fisher reward will take care of all of your Seafood farming needs. Place directly on top of a moderately sized (~3x3x2 or bigger) water pool, supply it with power, and a place to put the catches.  Make sure to spread your fishers out by 4-5 blocks, as having too many, too close, will reduce their efficiency.

betterquesting.name: Ol McDonald Grew Some Harm
betterquesting.desc:
Seeing as the mobs in this pack are more difficult than normal, it wouldn't be quite fair to send you out with a wiffle bat for a sword.  So craft me the basic Soulium Dagger, and I shall empower it for you.  

§6Tip:  Do not let the sword break, and dissappear... you will not have a shot an another empowered version until Care Package rune trade ins.

betterquesting.name: You Con-du-it!
betterquesting.desc: EnderIO conduits are some of the most flexible pipes in modded minecraft.  They are a common go to when automating processes and are compatible with the vast majority of machine based mods out there.

betterquesting.name: Something Smells Fishy
betterquesting.desc:
These automatic Fishing Nets will periodically collect fish from water beneath them and place them into adjacent chests.  You may want to set up an ender chest system to automatically collect and transfer the items into your Cooking For Blockheads Storage.

§3Pro Tip:  Don't have a water source nearby?  I've got you covered.  The attached Fishing Pond builder block will place a fishing pond (roughly 8x10) structure wherever you click.  It will clear any blocks or items in the way, so make sure you don't click too close to other structures you want to keep.

betterquesting.name: Better than Manure
betterquesting.desc:
Place worms down throughout your farm, they will wander the area and keep it moist and bonemealed.  They will die after a few days, so you will need to dig up dirt to find more, and replant them.

§6Tip: Lily Pads of fertility have a bonemeal effect on plants within a 4 yard radius.

betterquesting.name: Combustible Power
betterquesting.desc:
This section of the guide will introduce you to a few of the Power Options available at the MID-GAME level, since you will need to get your automation started, and you will not have access to the materials needed for End-Game energy options for a little while.

§3Pro Tip:  You are not expected to complete each branch of this part of the guide.  The goal is to have you select between Combustible Power (Coal, Oil, Etc..), Solar Power, or Kinetic (Windmills, Watermills, etc...)."  You are more than welcome to combine any power options you are familiar with.

betterquesting.name: Water Wheel Of Fortune
betterquesting.desc:
The benefits of the water wheel are that it does not require resources after initially setup.  Though the RF output is only 88rf/t for a 3 wheel system.. the benefits of not having to constantly provide fuel is a plus.§3

Pro Tip: You may want to look online for examples of the ideal structure to get the most from your water wheels.

betterquesting.name: Solar?! I barely know her!
betterquesting.desc:
The Solar Panel route of power production is a long term investment.  There are machines that cover power needs from early through the end game, and the materials needed can be challenging to come by.

§6Tip:  You will have a good portion of machines that run on EU power.  In fact, many of your end-game care packages may require an extensive set up of§a Molecular Tranformers§6 and§a Matter Fabricators§6, which run on EU.  Although RF/T can be converted to EU, the ratio is 4rf:1eu so you may find it better to simply have a stable EU power production line.

betterquesting.name: Its Time To Bite The Bullet
betterquesting.desc:
The IC2 Machines can suck up immense amounts of power, and still get thirsty for more.  In order to speed up yourend-game production, you need to get some hefty EU power generation going.  You have two options for this...
§6Nuclear Reactor:  §bThe IC2 Nuclear Reactor is a somewhat complex machine compared to the user friendly Extreme Reactor machines.  They require a perfectly balanced combination of parts that deal with heat distribution and fuel consumption.  They need to be monitored closely, or they could very well explode and rip a crater through your base the size of a football field.  
§6Solar Panels:  §bSolar Panels are a much easier route to take for mass EU production. The downside?  The recipes are intense... requireing you to replicate or transform, Iridium, Sunnarium, and other rare materials.  They will also have you crafting 60+ base level Solar Panels and tier crafting them into a single top tier solar panel.

§cI would suggest you begin by crafting the 60 base level Solar Panels.  Deploy them as you craft them, and use their energy to power the creation of the rest of the materials you will need.  Once you have created enough Iridium and Sunnarium, pull down the 60 Solar Panels, and use them to finish the crafting route to the top tier solar array.  Things will get much easier after that.

betterquesting.name: The Sunnarium Will Come Out
betterquesting.desc:
As mentioned in the previous quest, you can try to push through and craft the next tier(s) of Solar Panel, if you feel you have the materials now.  Or you can deploy these solar panels and use the energy you accrue to finish generating the materials you need.  

§6Tip:  As with everything else in this pack, the power output on these solar panels has been made slightly more reasonable.  (Prior to tweaking they gave a measley 1eu/t)

betterquesting.name: Almost There
betterquesting.desc: There are two different recipes that will allow you to get to the Quantum Solar Panel.  The least expensive version consists of Coal Chunks and Enriched Sunnarirum.

betterquesting.name: Solar Eclipse
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: I Need HOW Many?!
betterquesting.desc: If you really want to push for end game solar panel options, your best bet is to set up an autocrafting syste to avoid having to do the massive amounts of micro-crafting involved.

betterquesting.name: The Final Frontier
betterquesting.desc: Congratulations, you have crafted the highest tier  of Solar Panels.  This should be met with a reward of equal value.  This Illuminati pet will give you any item in the game, chosen randomly fom NEI, on a 2 minute cooldown.  Ot the possibilites.

betterquesting.name: Dynamo or Dynaless?
betterquesting.desc: The last crucial component of the water wheel setup is the Dynamo.  The dynamo supports up to 3 water wheels, and it is their turning action which allows it to create energy.

betterquesting.name: Whos In Charge Here?
betterquesting.desc: The Charging Station will refill the energy levels on all of your handheld tools and baubles.

betterquesting.name: I'm a Big Fan Of Yours
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: The Windmill Beneath My Wings
betterquesting.desc:
Windmills are similar to water wheels in that they dont require any fuel to produce RF. Imprvoved Windmill;s will generate up to 100rf/t depending on how high into the sky they are. For a decent return on investment, try to place your Windmill above Y:150

§3Pro Tip:  Industrial Hemp can be used for many things.  It's obviously used to make Tough Fabric for Windmills, but it can also be turned into String and therefore Wool.

betterquesting.name: You Reap What You Sew
betterquesting.desc: The Lightning Titan has caught wind of your recent power accumulation.  He has grown hungry for your vast amounts of Redstone Flux, and must be destroyed, lest you lose your power production to his grasp.

betterquesting.name: More Balls Than Eight
betterquesting.desc: The 2nd to last step in this journey towards the Quantuk Solar panel is the 8 Solar Panels that will be included in it's production.  Theres no stopping now!

betterquesting.name: IC2 Of You
betterquesting.desc: Industrial Craft 2 offers a variety of important end game processes. However, IC2 machines operate using Enery Units.  Energy units are a different "currency" of power... such as Redstone Flux (RF) or Grid Power (GP).  There are machines that will allow the conversion of power between the different types.  However, it can be challenging to provide the balance of power you need when converting from another mod.

betterquesting.name: Its In My Nature
betterquesting.desc: Now that you have begun harvesting the land and livestock in the area for goods and resources, you recieve a threat from the Nature Guardian.  He is not happy with your treatment of animals, and demands all you become a full time Tofu farmer.   Being the meat loving carnivore that you are, you take offense to these threats, and must summon the Nature Guardian to put him in his place.

betterquesting.name: You Can Burn That?!
betterquesting.desc: You can actually use the heat generated from Molten Metals to produce RF/t.  Using a Tinkers I/O Stirling Generator over a tank filled with molten metals.  Who'da thought?

betterquesting.name: EU Aint Just a Continent
betterquesting.desc: Energy Units (EU) require their own storage containers, as they can not be held in the same storage capacitors as RF or other power APIs.

betterquesting.name: Now Thats Some Spicy Food
betterquesting.desc: Culinary generators consume food and produce items to convert them into RF.  This is a great way to create a self sustaining farm that harvests wheat, uses a sagmill and furnace to turn it into flour and toast... then sends it to the Culinary Generator to recycle the power back into the farm.  You can run a large farm on just the wheat produced by a small portion of the farm... especially if you have upgraded Agricraft seeds.

betterquesting.name: Nature Finds a Way
betterquesting.desc: Show the Nature Guardian the wrath of a man that has eaten red meat all his life.

betterquesting.name: Touch The Sky
betterquesting.desc: The Airship workbench is where you will assemble your aircraft, make changes, apply paint, and add upgrades.

betterquesting.name: Ties That Bind
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Test Your Might
betterquesting.desc: It is time to continue cleansing the Magica Titans from this world.  Here are some provisions to aid you on your journey.  The road is rough, but the reward is abundant.

betterquesting.name: The Price Of Gas
betterquesting.desc: Fuel aint cheap.  It is highly recommended that you keep an ample supply of Viesoline on hand in case of emergencies.  You may want to start an automated Rocket Fuel system to make enough.

betterquesting.name: It's a Bird' Its a Plane!
betterquesting.desc:
Take good care of your Airship.  If/When you accidentally dismount in mid-air, your airship will slowly float down to earth... do everything in your power to prevent it from landing in Lava, Water, or any other dangerous entities.  If it does, you won't have much airship left.

§3Pro Tip: While the material of your airship only effects it's color, each actual Tier of Airship will have higher speeds, allowing you to go further on your fuel.  You will need to explore The Beneath to accrue the materials needed for Tier 3, and The End for materials needed for Tier 4.

betterquesting.name: Im On Top Of The World
betterquesting.desc:
Fly your Airship up to Y:275 and enjoy the view.

You aren't the only one who can fly.  This is your new battle pet.  He will fight for you and stay by your side.  He will level up and become stronger as he fights more enemies.  Let him take on small enemies by himself to gain the most XP.  You can also click him with Glowstone so that he lights your path as you travel.  If your bat takes fatal damage, he will return to your hotbar, until fully healed.  Heal your pet with Pumpkin Pie.

betterquesting.name: Viper MKII
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Blade Runner
betterquesting.desc: You will have the ability to place blocks, fire your weapons, and throw grenads from your airship.  JUSTICE RAINS FROM ABOVE!

betterquesting.name: Mid Air
betterquesting.desc: There may come a time when you are unable to land, but need to craft fuel or perform some other feats in the air.  Angel Blocks allow you to place blocks in mid air, with nothing connecting them... making things much easier for the pilot on the go.

betterquesting.name: Fly Higher Than An Eagle
betterquesting.desc: You can throw the banana to retrieve items.  And you dont even have to get out of your Airship!   You can also carry mobs, animals, and villagers in your airship... use the special Dismounter tool to pull them out of the airship when finished.

betterquesting.name: Alloy Meets Girl
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Gravity Falls
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: The Automatic Magmatic
betterquesting.desc: Used to melt down solids into molten or destabilized versions.  Will also allow you to recycle some parts back into their base materials.

betterquesting.name: Legendary Rune Trade
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Legendary Rune Trade
betterquesting.desc: Holds Unlimited RF

betterquesting.name: Legendary Rune Trade
betterquesting.desc: Will infinately power all of your Refined Storage and Reborn Storage machines.

betterquesting.name: Faster Than The Millenium Falcon
betterquesting.desc: This is the top tier, creme de la creme of Airships.  You next tier of flight is the Angel Ring.  While that may provide you the freedom of no ship to look after, it still will not have the speed capabilities of this work of art.

betterquesting.name: Legendary Rune Trade
betterquesting.desc: Infinite Storage

betterquesting.name: More Ships Than Iron Man Has Suits
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Been a Long Time Comin...
betterquesting.desc: This quest might seem out of place, but you gotta go get a dragon head anyways, might as well shuck some Shulkers....

betterquesting.name: He Went To Jareds...
betterquesting.desc: If you have not done so already, now would be a good time to dive into the Industrial Craft 2 quest line, and begin your production of Iridium and other End Game materials.

betterquesting.name: 24k And Lots Of It
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Hard Work Pays Off
betterquesting.desc: The ultimate flying apparatus... the Angel Ring.  No need for fuel, no need to charge it.  You simply must keep enough free GP in your Extra Utilies Grid.  You can always opt to continue using that awesome Airship as well.

betterquesting.name: Witch
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Zombie Apocolyps
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Legendary Rune Trade
betterquesting.desc: Infinite One Item Storage

betterquesting.name: Juicy Fruit
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Over Reacting Is a Good Thing
betterquesting.desc: Nuclear Reactors are considered the best end-game power production.  Unfortunately for you, many of§6 the materials that you will need in order to begin constructing your reactors are found in The Beneath. §f The beneath is a dark cavernous dimension where danger lurks in every shadow.  Staying in the dark for too long will cause the nasty Grue to come for you.  Torches are your best friend in this area, as they will keep the baddies at bay.

betterquesting.name: I Know Kung Fu
betterquesting.desc:
Before you can harness the massive power available to you in Nuclear Reactors, you will need to travel to some pretty harsh climates for supplies.  This is not a task to be taken lightly, and in order to prepare yourself, you will want to have at least a base knowledge of protection spells, armor, and weapons.  Show me what you know, then I will set you on your way.

§3Pro Tip:  You may want to have a way to get back home safely in case things go wrong.

betterquesting.name: A More Sturdy Reactor
betterquesting.desc:
Though there are other powerful options available in Industrial Craft 2 and Draconic Evolution Nuclear Reactors, this quest book will take you through the build of an Extreme Reactor.  Extreme Reactors do not blow up if something goes wrong.  They can also be upgraded further into Actively Cooled Turbine Reactors for even more power.

§6Tip: The maximum size of your Actively and Passively cooled (non-steam) Extreme Reactors has been limited to 15x15x23 in this pack.  You will not be able to make monstrously inefficient and unrealisticly large Reactors as you can in some packs.  This pack is about maximizing realistic tools... not just brute forcing extravagance.

betterquesting.name: I Like To Watch...
betterquesting.desc:
There are many resources online that you can research to determine the best setup for you.  For the purpose of these quests we will assume you are going with an all around, efficient 7x7x5 Reactor, with 5 Fuel Rods in an " X " shape in the middle.

§3Pro Tip:  Every reactor requires either a solid or liquidcoolant to be placed around the fuel rods, inside the casing.  This drastically reduces heat and improves fuel efficiency.  Graphite most likely the most economical option for you at this stage  However, the best coolant is§6 Vapor Of Levity§b§3, which we will switch to when we upgrade to our Steam Turbine.

betterquesting.name: Feed The Beast
betterquesting.desc: Your new Big Reactor eats Yellorium fuel.  It will produce waste called Cyanite which can be repurposed into Blutonium to be reused as fuel.

betterquesting.name: Just In Case
betterquesting.desc:
Extreme Reactors are multiblock power sources that can range from 3x3 up to 32x32.  The fuel consumption, power output, and heat efficiency varies greatly at nearly change in size. §6 Since an end-game Extreme ReactorTurbine can be fully powered to maximum efficiency with a 7x7x5 Reactor, it is recommended that you start with that size.

§3Pro Tip:In order to save fuel and make your reactor as efficient as possible, you will want to use some sort of monitor to Activate and Deactivate your reactor as your power storage fills or empties.

betterquesting.name: Brain Power
betterquesting.desc: O-oooooooooo AAAAE-A-A-I-A-U- JO-oooooooooooo AAE-O-A-A-U-U-A- E-eee-ee-eee AAAAE-A-E-I-E-A- JO-ooo-oo-oo-oo EEEEO-A-AAA-AAAA

betterquesting.name: Blood Magic
betterquesting.desc: Blood Magic is a deep magical experience that allows you to harness the power of sacrifice through blood, or Life Essence.  Many aspects of the end game will become easier if you master the Blood Magic arts.  From armor that could be considered on par with the best in the game... to spells that rival the Titans themselves...to the ability to summon meteors with rare and useful supplies.

betterquesting.name: The Beginning Of The End
betterquesting.desc:
You are going to want to find a large, flat, open area to build your Blood Altar and Blood Magic Structures.  The Blood Altar itself will soon grow to be 24*24*9.  You may want to elevate your center Blood Altar piece about 5 or 6 blocks off the ground to allow for the full altar to be above ground.

§6Tip:  The Sacrificial Dagger is used to poke yourself.  While standing next to the Blood Altar, using it will place 300 LP into the Altar, and deal 1 point of damage to you.

betterquesting.name: Finish Your Sentients
betterquesting.desc: Craft a "Sentient Sword." When you kill things with this sword, you will get more Demon Will. What is more, when you pick up a piece of Demonic Will from the ground while you have a tartaric gem in your inventory, the Will will go into that gem, deleting the Demonic Will item.

betterquesting.name: Where There's a Will...
betterquesting.desc:
Will is a crafting reagent for Blood Magic that is dropped from mobs.  When dropped, it will have a quality number.  The beefier the mob, usually the beefier the will.

§2Quest Tip:  Throw the snare you crafted in the previous quests at mobs until you see white particles coming from the mob.  When this happens, kill the mob and it will drop Demonic Will.  Gather 2 pieces to start with.

betterquesting.name: Hell To The Ya Fire Forge
betterquesting.desc: You will need to create a Hellfire Forge. This block will be used for almost all recipes that involve this "Demonic Will." Demonic Will, or shortened simply as "Will," is used as an energy source. As such, you will need a way to use it, store it, and get more of it, and this block will do just that.

betterquesting.name: Is There Anything We Dont Automate?
betterquesting.desc:
Catching mobs and pricking yourself with a dagger are extremely slow ways to fill your Blood Altar.  There are ways to automate the process.  The Well Of Suffering Ritual is one way.  It will slowly drain the life of any mobs in the area, adding that LP to your Blood Altar.  Another, somewhat less involved method is by using a simple mob spawner, with Blood Arsenal glass shards around the altar, and some cleverly placed fans pushing the mobs into the glass shards.  

§6Pro Tip:  You can have more than one Blood Altar connected to your network.  One fully upgraded "main" altar... and maybe one less upgraded altar simply used to collect LP from a mob grinder setup.  This allows you customize the runes used in the altar, to be best suited for the Altar's purpose.

betterquesting.name: Your Network Password
betterquesting.desc:
Blood Orbs are the "Debit Card" for Life Essence stored in your Life Essence Network.  Just as the Sacrificial Dagger allows you to deposit LE into your Blood Altar, the Blood Orb allows you to deposit LE into your Life Essence Network.  Spells, Rituals, and other tasks will all drain from your Life Essence Network when they need to.  Always keep a Divination Sigil handy to see how much LE your network has.  Many crafting recipes also require your Blood Orb.

§2§6Pro Tip:  This book reward offers very valuable information about the custom changes made to Blood Magic in this modpack.  It is HIGHLY recommended that you read through it.

betterquesting.name: Like A Bat Outta Hell
betterquesting.desc:
Your handlers didn't send you on this journey alone.  They have included a Special Operative Viscious Attack Bat to fight by your side.   Your bat will be a vital part of your journey.  It will level up and gain Health Points and Attack Damage as it fights by yourside. If your pet bat is mortally wounded, it will return to your inventory awaiting medical care.  A levelled up bat does a good amount of damage, so you should always keep him by your side.

§6Pumpkin Pie §fis the food of choice for your bat.  If they are injured, throw a piece of pumpkin pie on the ground, and then place your bat on it.  It will consume the delicious pumpkin goodness and return to full health.  You can also toss out pie to heal your pet while it is still active.   You can even apply §eGlowstone§e §fto your bat to provide light.

§3Pro Tip:  In the unlikely inicident that lose your pet bat permanently, you can tame another using, of course... pumpkin pie.  This quest will also remain repeatable daily.

betterquesting.name: Actually Additions
betterquesting.desc: Actually Additions is a mod with a taste of everything.  There is some ore processing, and item empowering.  Many of the gems and crystals that are empowered within this mod, will be used in recipes stretching through the end game.

betterquesting.name: Reconstruct All The Things
betterquesting.desc: Use 2 Black Quartz Blocks to make Chiseled Quartz.  Use those in the reconstructor to make Ethetic Quartz Blocks.

betterquesting.name: Juicy Fruit
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Juicy Fruit
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Industrial Craft Of The Titans?
betterquesting.desc:
Industrial craft is a very powerful mod that introduces deep crafting mechanics, enery production, and powerful tools.

Included in this mod are the §4Nuclear Reactor§f which can produce mass quantities of EU, and also creates useful waste products that are used in other important recipes.  The §c§4Mass Fabricator § which creates UU matter from energy.  §4UU Matter§f can be used to create nearly any end game crafting material.  Among the remaining machines is the Molecular Transformer, that allows you to invest massive amounts of RF in order to create srare items.

§3Pro Tip:  NEVER break or pick up an Industrial Craft machine with anything other than a wrench.  Using a pickaxe, hammer, or even your hand, has a high chance to ruin the machine, leaving you nothing but the frame.

betterquesting.name: Macerator Madness
betterquesting.desc: The Macerator is similar to the Sage Mill fro EnderIO or the crusher from Actually Addions.

betterquesting.name: Metal Former, Robot In Disguise
betterquesting.desc: The metal former will allow you to make plates, wire, casing, etc... at a much more efficient rate than the Engineer's hammer.

betterquesting.name: The Canner Do Atittude
betterquesting.desc: Buckets don't stack, but cans do.  The IC2 Canner will make handling fluids much easier.

betterquesting.name: Ore Washing
betterquesting.desc: Ore Washing is a way to ensure that you get additional drops from your ores.  Macerate the ore first, then wash it for ore doubling and a chance at other drops.

betterquesting.name: Crafting Crafting Seeds to craft Seeds
betterquesting.desc:
Crafting Seeds allow you to create variations of seed types.  If you want Iron, Stone, Gold, Glowstone, Creeper, or any other version of seeds, you must combine the related mod or resource drops, with crafting seeds, to create a seed of that variant.  Then when grown, the plant will drop an Essence of that particular mob or resource.

§6Tip:  If you end up with seeds of a particular version that you no longer need, or have too many of, you can place them into the Seed Reprocessor to break them down into useable essence of that seed type.

betterquesting.name: Juicy Fruit
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Clever Title About Scanners
betterquesting.desc: In order for your Mass Fabricator to begin turning UU Matter into items, the item must be scanned in the Scanner then assigned a pattern to store in Pattern Storage.

betterquesting.name: Your First UU Baby
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Juicy Fruit
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Its An Animal House
betterquesting.desc: An easy way to stay organized while producing a larger quantity of livestock drops is to have pens set up for breeding and killing of livestock.  This will require one pen equipped with a Minefactory §aBreeder§f, to keep all animals within a 5x5 area in front of it breeding on cooldown.  It will also require a §aChronotyper§f machine which will remove baby animals from the breeding pen, and place them into the Kill pen.   Finally, a Minefactory §aGrinder§f will be in the kill pen awaiting the tranformation of the babies into their adult form, at which point they will be harvested for their succulent meat drops.

betterquesting.name: Pam Is Back On The Market
betterquesting.desc: If you are missing some ingredients for your garden, some trees for your orchard, or some animals for your barn, the Market Block is your one stop shop.

betterquesting.name: Reinforcments Have Arrived
betterquesting.desc:
Did you know you can create toughened blast resistant stone blocks with just 1 Piece of Stone and 1 Grout?  Something to keep in mind as you build your compound.

§aReinforced stone is Blast Resistant.  This will keep pesky creepers and Dynamite wielding baddies from doing too much damage.  This will also prevent MOST mobs from breaking through the walls and entering your base.  §9§bHOWEVER, there are certain mobs who will break through even the toughest of reinforced stone.  Its best to count on a web of security options to protect your base.

betterquesting.name: Turret Components
betterquesting.desc: Turrent Components.

betterquesting.name: Upgrade Them Bad Boys
betterquesting.desc: Turret components.

betterquesting.name: Spawner?  I barely know her!
betterquesting.desc: Dark glass is helpful when making a mob farm because it does not allow light to pass through.  So you may see the mobs on the other side, but it does not prevent them from spawning.

betterquesting.name: A Base of Operations
betterquesting.desc:
You will find that mobs have become quite smart, using pickaxes to dig through stone walls... or dynamite to make quick work of your barricades.  Using blast resistant blocks is  surefire way to prevent dynamite from spreading too much destruction.

§dPro Tip: Mystical Agriculture allows for the growing and crafting of Blast Resistant Blocks and Glass via Wither Essence seeds.

betterquesting.name: We Can Do This Two Ways..
betterquesting.desc: Iron Golems are great at protecting your base. They have high health and hit like a truck.  Look to purchase more Iron Golems from the Rare Titan Rune Trade ins later in the pack.

betterquesting.name: This Aint No Veggie Farm
betterquesting.desc: Soul Vials are used to capture mobs, and rerelease them elsewhere.  They can also be combined with a Broken Spawner in an EnderIO Soul Binder to change the type of Broken Spawner.  The Broken Spawner can then be combined with an EnderIO Powered Spawner in an Anvil to create a Powered Spawner of the mob of your choice.

betterquesting.name: Early Game Options
betterquesting.desc:
This modpack has TONS of options to defend your base, create mob farms, and manipulate the enemies of this world.  Do not overlook these items.  Mobs in this pack become increasingly difficulty, and if you dont continue to upgrade your defenses, you will soon see them overcome by a horde.  §aTry these Damage Traps and Vector plates outside weak areas of your base to help fend off any looters.

§5§6Pro Tip:  The damage and accuracy of most turrets have been amplified to match the improved AI of the mobs in this pack.  Dont be afraid to use some of the lower tier turrets.  They may be more effective than you remember.

betterquesting.name: Juicy Fruit
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: They Did The Monster Mash
betterquesting.desc: The Mob Grinder Utilities Mob is you one stop shop for all things Mob Farm related.  The main attraction being the Mob Grinder.  It is upgradeable with all sorts of enhancments including popular enchants like Looting, Beheading, and Sharpness.

betterquesting.name: Juicy Fruit
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Tim The Toolman Taylor
betterquesting.desc:
The Toolbelt mod adds exactly what you think it does... a Coffee Maker.   Just Kidding, that's Actually Additions (for some reason?).... It adds a Toolbelt.  This item will store from 2 to 9 tools, allowing you to select whichever tool you want from a rotary wheel when holding down the hotkey.  The belt starts with 2 slots, but additional pouches can be crafted and attached an an anvil.  This will save lots of space in your inventory. §aThe Toolbelt will also fit into a Baubles spot!

§6Tip:  The default for the Toolbelt UI is " R " but this key most likely conflicts with another keybind, and must be changed before it will work.

betterquesting.name: Roomba Schmoomba
betterquesting.desc:
Vaccuum chests are valuable additons to any farm, as they collect, store, and transfer any items picked up in a 6 block radius.  

§3Pro Tip:  You can do some miraculous things using a Cotton Swab on a low life mob.

betterquesting.name: Im Your #1 Fan
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Meet Joe Hack
betterquesting.desc:
Different mob farms work best for different mobs.  Its hard to beat the rate of Ender Pearl return on a Killer Joe with The Ender Sword.

§3Pro Tip: The Ender Tether keeps Endermen in the area from teleporting away.

betterquesting.name: Wither Or Not
betterquesting.desc:
Setting up a Wither killing booth is a worthwhile goal for the end game.  The preparation can be a bit more challenging though.  The entire kill chamber is subject to blast and wither damage, so Reinforced Obsidian (or similar blocks) is highly recommended.

§3Pro Tip:  The placement of soul sand and wither skulls to spawn a Wither, can be automated using some simple redstone and the automatic Block Placers.

betterquesting.name: Get off my lawn!
betterquesting.desc: Passive Defenses, such as ground spikes and electrified gates can be just as effective as flashy turrets.

betterquesting.name: Experience The Tranquility
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Zap Em Like Flies
betterquesting.desc: You can balance your security system around the amount of power and resources you want to dedicate to to it.  Speed upgrades can turn a slow, heavy hitting turret into a wrecking ball.  And Solar panels can turn an energy hog into a self sustaining entity.

betterquesting.name: Never Bring Sand To the Beach
betterquesting.desc:
There are three important goals for your first few days/nights.  Coke Oven, Blast Furnace, and Base Defense.  The action comes quick and furiously... so take the time to fortify our base against explosions, fire, and/or pesky looters ASAP.  

§6These Tier 1 Turret Bases should help you get started on defending your property.  You will recieve some additional assistance a few quests down.

betterquesting.name: Feel The Power
betterquesting.desc:
You will realize fairly quickly that we have made sure you have all the tools necessary to take on the powerful foes to come.  Weapons have lavish damage, enchantability, and in some cases durability.  It will serve you well to pay attention to the stats on each weapon to make sure you are armed properly for whats to comem.§3

Pro Tip:  Almost every set of armor you come across will have "set bonuses". This means, if you equip Helm, Chest, Legs, and Boots of that same armor material, you will activate a special buff.  Pressing Shift while hovering your mouse over a piece of armor will reveal the set bonus.

betterquesting.name: Nether Gonna Get It
betterquesting.desc:
There are many options for good armor in this pack, and it does not take long to have "better-than-diamond" level gear.  In order to seriously take on the titans, it is advised to consider having gear equivalent to Manyullan or Lava Crystal level.

§6Tip:  Many of the materials you will need to begin preparing for end game combat come from the nether.  Ardite, Cobalt, and Onyx are all native to the nether only.

betterquesting.name: Armor Plus Enemy Minus
betterquesting.desc: There are endless options for armor, and not all will be covered through quests. However, there are a few sets of armor that you may want to lean towards.  Armor Plus Ultimate Armor is one of them.

betterquesting.name: Whats In the Chest?!
betterquesting.desc: Take the time to make sure your gear is enchanted with the best possible traits.

betterquesting.name: Absorbtion And You
betterquesting.desc: Absorbtion is a big protecting yourself against foes who ignore armor, or hit so hard that even top level armor can be overcome.  There are multiple sources of absorbtion in this pack.  You can enchant armor with Absorbtion enchants that stack... or find Ability Totems that add absorbtion levels.

betterquesting.name: Its The Small Details That Matter
betterquesting.desc: Enchantments can turn mediocre armor into a nearly inpenatrable shell if done properly.  In Craft Of The Titan there are specifically powerful enchantments that will allow almost any end-game armor to stand up to the hardest of bosses.

betterquesting.name: Just Gotta Know Where To Look
betterquesting.desc: Lava Stones are a common crafting item.  They are very difficult to find in the Overworld, as the climate is too cool close to the surface.  However, they are abundant in the deep pits of the Nether.  Venture to the Nether and gather a good amount, you will need them.

betterquesting.name: Guardians of the Galaxy
betterquesting.desc: One of the most powerful mid-game armor sets you can equip is the Guardian Armor.  You will need to find an underwater temple to farm Guardians, or capture them to make a spawner back at your base.

betterquesting.name: Its Like White Out, For Enchants
betterquesting.desc: The disenchantment table will allow you to remove enchants from one piece of armor, and selectively apply them to a book, which you can use to enchant a different piece of Armor or weapons.

betterquesting.name: Oh, They Get A Lot Better
betterquesting.desc: While low level Armor Plus armor and weapons can be crafted on a low tier workbench.  Higher Armor Tiers will require a more capable workbench.

betterquesting.name: You Got Enough To Feed The Needy
betterquesting.desc: The expedition missions to discover more favorable lands, safe from the Titans, has put a lot of resource stress on your homeland.  They need provisions, and they need them now.  Send them a Care Package of food to help feed the needy.

betterquesting.name: Cache Me Outside
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Magical Fluids
betterquesting.desc: Researchers back at your homelands are clammoring for information they can gain from any specimens you send back.

betterquesting.name: Your Pain, Their Gain
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Iron Out Your Problems
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Sunnarium In My Eyes
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Mobs Drop It Like Its Hot
betterquesting.desc: There is a group back home that would love to get their hands on this care package.

betterquesting.name: Lead By Example
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: More Like Never Stars
betterquesting.desc: Setting up a Wither Boss Farm is the Badge Of Honor for the end game of most packs.  You will need to push yours to the limit with full automation to accrue enough stars for this care package.

betterquesting.name: The Motion Of The Potion
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.desc: Your good deeds have netted you Titan Runes!  You can use them in certain crafting recipes, or trade them in for rewards.

§6The RFTools Builder is one of the most versatile building blocks in the game.  In can clear large configurable areas, build dozens of shapes, quarry with silk touch, fortune, and/or any number of upgrades.  The "Shape Cards" you insert will open up a list of capabilities.

betterquesting.name: Uncommon Rune
betterquesting.desc: Although the Jetpack may not have all the bells and whistles as the Vibrant or Dark Soularium Jetpack, this one attaches directly to your existing Chest armor, so you don't have to sacrifice any set bonusess your armor may provide.

betterquesting.name: Uncommon Rune
betterquesting.desc:
Your good deeds have netted you Titan Runes! 

§6Don't feel like hunting down mobs with soul vials, combining broken spawners, and wasting XP on creating new spawner types?  Take this Mob Farm starter kit.

§aIncludes Ready Made Spawners for:  §fEnderman, Skeleton, Stray, and Wither Skeletons

In addition, the higher up in Y level that the drill is placed, the more efficient it is.  Laser Drill prechargers (not included) are also highly recommended to feed the drill RF and speed up the process.

§6Tip:  Though the Drill will usually fish up a vast variety of ores, you can steer it to focus on a particular color of ore by using the Laser Focus.

OH! Did I mention you can duel-wield these Wild West style?

betterquesting.desc: These Laser Drill Prechargers are used to greatly increase the speed of the Laser Drill by feeding it constant flows of Redstone Flux.

§6Tip:  Duel Wielding weapons can be strong... but in the right situation, a Shield can save your life.  Especially when that shield has 40 levels of Thorns to damage attackers.

§6Tip: Healing stations provide strong healing regeneration in a small area.  The can be handy for setting up a self sacrifice station for Blood Magic... or to incorporate into the area you plan to fight a nasty Titan in.

betterquesting.desc: Open up the Fortune Quarry capabilties of your RFTools Builder block.

betterquesting.name: Rare Titan Rune Trade
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Rare Titan Rune Trade
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Rare Titan Rune Trade
betterquesting.desc: This is a very powerful charm, it can be worn as a bauble, and will protect you from any and all damage when you go below 30% health. Each hit it protects you from it will take a little bit of durability from the charm, but the charm will slowly repair itself and never breaks.

betterquesting.name: Rare Titan Rune Trade
betterquesting.desc: §6The Phoenix Down acts as both an Angelic Feather and an Angelheart Vial.  This offers protection from fall damage in exchange for hunger... and also provides death protection, restoring health and offering status buffs when you would otherwise take fatal damage.

betterquesting.name: Rare Titan Rune Trade
betterquesting.desc: §6Causes crops in it's vacinty to grow faster.  Effect stacks with other Lilypads.

betterquesting.name: Rare Titan Rune Trade
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Rare Titan Rune Trade
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Rare Titan Rune Trade
