betterquesting.name: Rare Titan Rune Trade
betterquesting.desc: §6The Infernal Tear, when activated the first time searches a player's inventory for the most common item it can accept and sets itself to it.  Once enabled it starts consuming the item out of the player's inventory and converts it to experience.

betterquesting.name: Rare Titan Rune Trade
betterquesting.desc: §6The Tome of Alkahestry is a perplexing gadget.  It consumes common quaity Titan Runes in order to gain charge.  It can then duplicate certain items it is placed into a crafting table with, at the cost of charge.

betterquesting.name: Rare Titan Rune Trade
betterquesting.desc: §6The Angelheart Vial protects you from certain death one time.  When you would otherwise die, it will shatter, restoring some health and buffing you with some helpful status effects.

betterquesting.name: Rare Titan Rune Trade
betterquesting.desc: The Solar Panel is the Top Tier of Solar EU Generation.

betterquesting.name: Alloy There Maytee!
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: To Keep That Suit Fresh and Clean
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Shots Fired!
betterquesting.desc:
Your journey through this new land has pushed the boundaries of your homeland into a new frontier.   Every frontier needs it's Lawkeeper.  And what is the "long arm of the law" without a means to enact justice?  Allow us to introduce§6 "Justice"§f:  a revolver that was specifically designed to fit the rough and callous hands of a soldier such as yourself.  It's ability to mead out punishment is matched only by the determination of those who §f§f§f§fwield§  it.

§6Pro Tip: As with most things in this pack, the revolver has been balanced to be a viable end game weapon... do not underestimate it.

betterquesting.name: Totemic Might
betterquesting.desc:
The Brewing Stand can usually make potions up level III... many of the ability totems will apply a constant buff upwards of level 5 tier.   A strategic combination of Potions and Totems will make you nearly invincible, regardless of the armor you are wearing.  The key is to know your opponent, understand their weaknesses, and capatilize on each fight's mechanics.

§7§6Pro Tip:  Offensive potions can turn the tide of battles as well.  A Splash Potion of Harming or a Splash Potion of Healing vs. Undead can be like a "grenade" of damage.

betterquesting.name: Use All Of Your Options
betterquesting.desc: There are tons of options for creating the ultimiate defense.  The most terrifying bosses, including the Chaos Dragon, can be trivialized if you make good use of everything available to you.  One example of this, is the Reliquary potion system.  The potions are stronger than what you would find in Vanilla Minecraft, and stack with all of the Ability Totems, Enchants, and Spells that you already have in your arsenal.

betterquesting.name: Compact And Efficient
betterquesting.desc: You are going to be brining a lot of things into battle... from torches, to tools, to weapons, to pets, etc... Do not underestimate the power of a well time potion to turn the tides of battle for you.

betterquesting.name: Let Me Upgrade Ya
betterquesting.desc:
At some point you will want to automate the input and output of Life Essence from your Altar into some sort of Fluid Storage system.  This will assist with large infusions that require more Life Essence than your altar can hold at once.  Life Essence can be piped in or out of your altar using Fluid Conduits or similar.

§6Tip:  "The book Blood Magic Blood Altar Upgrades" which you recieved after completing the quest adjacent to this one, is a great resource for finding out how to build your altar, and also some of the distinct changes made for Blood Magic in this pack.

betterquesting.name: Bound By Blood
betterquesting.desc:
Using the Alchemy Array you must combine a Binding Reagent and a Diamond Sword to create a bound sword.  Killing enemies with this sword has a chance to make them drop Weak Blood Shards.  While being used in many recipes, the most notable aspect of the Weak Blood Shards it §6they are used to craft the Large Bloodstone Bricks required to create the Tier 4 Altar.

§5Pro Tip:  The Bound Blade is enchantable, making the collection of Weak Blood Shards much easier.

betterquesting.name: Who You Callin Weak?
betterquesting.desc:
There are many tpes of Blood Shards.  The most common and earliest you will run into are the Weak Blood Shards.  They are used in many recipes; Most notably in the creation of Ritual Stones, used in setting up the structures necessary to perform rituals.  
     You will also create your §6Masters Blood Orb§6 §fby placing a Weak Blood Shard into an altar, and infusing it with 25,000 LP.  This is no easy task for a low level altar, so you will want to make use of external Life Essence storage tanks, and possibly Displacement Runes to speed up the transfer of the Life Essence into the Altar.  Remember, if the altar runs dry during an infusion, you will begin to lose progress on the infusion.

betterquesting.name: Richie Ritual
betterquesting.desc: The Ritual Diviner is a tool to automatically assemble ritual stones for you.  Place a Master Ritual Stone, with enough space around, above, and below it... then use the Ritual Diviner on the Master Ritual Stone with the appropriate Ritual Stones in your inventory.  The ritual will assemble itself as you hold the Right Mouse button.  Make sure there are NO OBSTRUCTIONS (including grass or flowers) in the way of where the ritual stones should be placed.  This process consumes a small amount of LP.

betterquesting.name: Slates Of All Sizes
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Alchemy Array Relay
betterquesting.desc:
You will want to be able to get some more information about the Blood Altar and your Soul Network. To do this, you will want to craft the Divination Sigil. To craft this sigil you need a Blank Slate and a piece of redstone dust using an "Alchemy Array." 
   An Alchemy Array can be created by crafting some "Arcane Ash" using the Hellfire Forge and right clicking on the ground with the ash. This will create a circle on the ground. If you then right click on this circle with first the redstone dust and then the blank slate, the Alchemy Array will create a Divination Sigil. This is how Alchemy Array crafting works.

betterquesting.name: Queue the Angelic Music
betterquesting.desc:
Many things open up to you at this point, the most important being Rituals.  This is also the point at which you can plan to tackle some of the rewarding custom Craft Of The Titans Meteor rituals.The Ritual called Mark of the Falling Tower summons a huge meteor to slam into the earth filled with Ores.  Thankfully, our trusty science team back in our homeland has devised a way to infuse the meteors with helpful supply shipments.  
§6
Pro Tip:  There are three custom Titan Meteors to summon.  One delivers a meteor filled with the Highest Tier of Open Modular Turrets, turret bases, and ammo crates.  This is the only way to obtain the most powerful pieces of your base defense system.  The 2nd Meteor is the Mystical Agriculture Meteor which summons a large meteor filled with Essence, Growth Accelerators, and Proserity Ore.  Well worth the summoning, as you are sure to find lots of top tier essences.  Lastly, the Refined Storage Meteor which slams down with a full array of Refined Storage componets,  and auto crafting machines.

betterquesting.name: Agricultural Asteroid Reagent
betterquesting.desc:
§6Agricultural Asteroid - §fA Meteor slams to earth revealing it is made of dozens of blocks of Mystical Agriculture items.  These include blocks of essences, up to and including the top tiers.  And it also includes a large number of Growth Accelerators to speed up your farm's overall production.

When you activate the Mark Of The Fallen Tower ritual, drop a §a"Msytical Fertilizer" §e§6§fonto the Master Ritual Stone to summon this meteor.  (You may want to stand back)

betterquesting.name: Ritual: Storage Star
betterquesting.desc:
§6Storage Star - A Meteor slams to earth revealing it is made completely out of Refined Storage components.  It will include everything from storage disks to controllers, to crafting machines.  In order to reduce broken package deliveries, many of the components have been encased in stone blocks. §b Place the blocks in the crafting table, or use JEI to view them. Be aware of the flexible recipe block that can be crafted into numerous components to fill any gaps you may have.
 
§aWhen you activate the Mark Of The Fallen Tower ritual, drop a "Quartz Enriched Iron Ingot" onto the Master Ritual Stone to summon this meteor.  (You may want to stand back)

betterquesting.name: Military Meteor Reagent
betterquesting.desc:
§6Military Meteor - This meteor slams to earth revealing its contents full of military grade base defenses.  Tier 4 and 5 Turrets, Bases, Ammo, and Upgrades that cant be gained by any other means.  After you summon this meteor, Blood Moons are but a joke. §f In order to reduce broken package deliveries, many of the components have been encased in stone blocks.  Place the blocks in the crafting table, or use JEI to view them.

§l§b§l§l§r§bWhen you activate the Mark Of The Fallen Tower ritual, drop a §b§a"Sensor {Tier 1)"§b onto the Master Ritual Stone to summon this meteor.  (You may want to stand back)

betterquesting.name: First Three Days: Prepare Thyself!
betterquesting.desc:
You will receive a 3 day buffer of peace, during which no mobs can enter the chunk which you have placed your Mob Blocker.  Hopefully you put this around your base, since mobs have some destructive abilities.  Once this wears off, all hell breaks lose.  Mobs will do everything in their power to get to you, and there is no way to hide.  Burrowing underground will just get you hunted by the depths mobs who have been given the tools to make sure an underground base is quite the challenge.  

§6TL;DR Use your first three days to solidify your base, using whatever cheap methods you can find... there are even some quest that provide ground spikes, turrets, or fences that can help.

Tip: Mobs are attracted to sound, such as pistons or ore grinders.  They are also attracted to lights, such as outside torches.  So build your base wisely in order to fend off the mobs... or never attract them to begin with.

betterquesting.name: Exploration and Automation
betterquesting.desc:
While you will continuously be fortifying your base against the ever increasing difficulty of the mobs (no, seriously, they get harder as you play)... you will need to begin venturing out and exploring.  Exploration is essential in this pack, and there are many progression items that you simply can not get otherwise.  

§3§aThings you will want to look for:

§6Doom Like Dungeons - §aHigh Tier Loot the further you get.  Crawling with tough mobs.
§6Coralium Infested Biomes - §aAbyssal craft exploration will be coming up very soon, and you will need to be familiar with where to gether supplies and kill mobs.
§6Roguelike Dungeons -§a More forgiving than Doom Like Dungeons.  Good location to find mid-tier loot, mob spawners, and early game supplies.

§bYou will want to explore the documentation availible for Abyssalcraft, as that will be the first dimension you will make plans to visit.

betterquesting.name: There Will Be Blood
betterquesting.desc:
Blood Magic is the "core" mod for this modpack.  Not only for the awesome spell and potion system, but for the extremely powerful end-game gear.  It is a very user friendly magic mod that does not require a lot of confusing practice to master.

§6Many of the end-game aspects of this modpack are achieved through reaching a Blood Altar of lvl 4, and then performing rituals.  One ritual in particular, will summon huge meteors to slam into the earth, and when the smoke clears, the meteor will contain high tier technology to help you on your journey.  If you are looking to get a Refined Storage system w/ autocrafting... an extensive farmland of Mystical Agriculture crops... and/or the highest level of base protection, you will want to start working through Blood Magic ASAP

betterquesting.name: It's Not Called Vein Miner!
betterquesting.desc:
"Does this modpack include Vein Miner?" No.  This modpack has Ore Excavation... which is the same thing as Vein Miner... Just a different mod/name.  Get used to it people!

§3Tip:  The Pickappa is a tool used primarily to Vein Mine stone and cobbletone... this saves durability on your more capable mining tools.

§6Tip: Vein mining is rigorous activity and therefore causes you to become hungry much quicker than regular mining.  Be sure to bring lots of food.

betterquesting.name: Out of the Wood Works
betterquesting.desc: Though you will find many options for tools and weapons throughout your journey, few will be as customizeable as Tinker's.  Even some tinker's stats have been adjusted to provide more viability within this modpack, so you will want to do some thorough browsing to figure out what works best for you.

betterquesting.name: Making Ends Meet
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: I am Grout.
betterquesting.desc: §f§f§6With your new§d Baconator§6 in hand, hold shift and you will stuff eligible food from your inventory into it's feed buffer.  If you hold§a Shift+Right Click you will place the Baconator on auto-feed mode. §k§fWhile in this mode, the Baconator will keep your hunger filled for as long as it has food inside of it.  Your Baconator can be picky about what it holds... most Harvestcraft and Vanilla meals will work.  If you fill your baconator with large meals, it will only feed you when you are very hungry, to make the most of the food.  If you prefer your hunger topped off more frequently, fill your Baconator with food that is less filling.

betterquesting.name: Flight Of The Navigator
betterquesting.desc:
Your Airship Kit MKI is good towards one trade in for a Titan Wing MKI in the material of your choosing . From Oak Wood to Emerald, there is sure to be a color that suits your needs.

You will want to begin producing hefty amounts of Rocket Fuel from EnderIO.  This will be used in the process of making Viesoline, the fuel of your Airship

betterquesting.name: Flight Of The Navigator II
betterquesting.desc:
Your Airship Kit MKI is good towards one trade in for a Titan Wing MKI in the material of your choosing . From Oak Wood to Emerald, there is sure to be a color that suits your needs.

You will want to begin producing hefty amounts of Rocket Fuel from EnderIO.  This will be used in the process of making Viesoline, the fuel of your Airship

betterquesting.name: Setting Up The Perimeter
betterquesting.desc:
You can configure turrets to only kill hostile mobs by clicking through their GUI.  This is especially important when turrets are within range of your livestock and golems. 

§6Pro Tip: Keep in mind, that friendly units that happen to stroll into the line of fire when the turrets are shooting at hostile mobs will still take damage and possibly die.  So its best to place your turrets above the line of site to friendly mobs.

betterquesting.name: Heed These Words..
betterquesting.desc:
Many of the items used to craft high level turrets are created from the parts of lower tier turrets.  You WILL want to upgrade your turrets, since mob health and resistance gets higher as time goes by.  Low level turrets will become much less effective when the mobs have twice as much health.

§

betterquesting.name: Collossal Chests Be the Best
betterquesting.desc:
Collosal Chests are exactly that... Huge Chests with hundreds or even thousands of slots to hold your goods.  Since you will not have access to Refined Storage until further into the pack (Summoned from a Blood Magic Meteor) you will want to rely on Collosal Chests and Storage Drawers to organize your inventory.

§6Pro Tip:  The max Collosal Chest in this pack is 8x8x8.  Also consider there  may be some inventory panels that will help you monitor the contents via the chest interface.

betterquesting.name: Interface is The Place
betterquesting.desc: If you want to automate the extraction or importing of any items of the Collosal Chests, you must hook your machines or transfer pipes up to the Interface of the chest.

betterquesting.name: What Core Could You Ask For
betterquesting.desc:
Each Collosal Chest must have one "Core".  This is placed in the middle of one of the outside walls, and §6dictates the direction the chest will be facing.

§aTip: Common Runes are important crafting components that are found often in underground dungeons.  You will also be able to craft them later when you begin creating UU-Matter.

betterquesting.name: Tinker's I/O
betterquesting.desc:
Tinker's I/O is a module that allows the upgrade of the smeltery in order to perform tasks quicker.  It also includes the use of solid fuel and smeltery tools.

§7§6Tip:  Place the Fuel Input block right next to the Smeltery Control, as though it was the next piece of the smeltery wall.

betterquesting.name: More Like Instant Output
betterquesting.desc:
This Tinker I/O Smart Out put is a drain controller that allows you to automate the creation of ingots and blocks without switching out the basin types.  It can be redstone controlled, and allows it's contents to be pulled out via pipes.  It is also much faster than the normal basin, as it dries ingots and blocks immediately.

§6Tip:  Upgrades in all Tinkers I/O machines stack.  Place more upgrades into the smart output to increase the buffer size.

betterquesting.name: Its Like Super Duper Lava Rocks
betterquesting.desc:
Solid fuel is used in the Tinkers I/O Fuel Input machine to quick-feed the smeltery a high speed alternative to lava.  It uses a chemically balanced mixture Turds and Coal Coke to create a high heat solid thats 10x more potent than a single piece of coal.

§6Pro Tip -  The most common droppers of le' Turds are Dogs, who drop two upon death, and Rats that drop one on death.

betterquesting.name: Im In Love Wit The Coke
betterquesting.desc: The biproduct of using the Coke Oven, is over course that you get slag.  This is a main component for making your Blast Furance.

betterquesting.name: Early Game Options
betterquesting.desc:
You will notice that mobs will make quick work of weaker building materials.  If they don't burn it down with Creeper Napalm, they will pick at it with tools until it breaks.  Be quick to replace weak portions of your base with more beefier options.

§6Pro Tip:  Certain Pressure Plates will only activate for certain entities.  Dark Steel Pressure plates only activate if a Player steps on them.  No unwanted mobs activating your doors is a very good thing.

betterquesting.name: The Finer Arts
betterquesting.desc:
You can not brute force your way through every battle.  In order to take on the toughest Titans you will need to master the Dark Arts, Blood Magic, and a variety of spells to rain destruction down on your foes, cast protective spells on yourself, or turn the tides on the horde of mobs.

§6Ars Magica is a mod about making spells... some are uselessly weak, and others are game breakingly strong.  Your biggest goal to start with, is simple... §ause low tier spells to level up.  Levelling up increases your Mana, which is used to pay for spells you cast.  It also increases the rate at which your Burnout returns to normal.  Burnout is like stamina... using too many spells too fast, will make them cost more and more mana. §6 The bigger your mana pool (represented in the bottom right of the screen when you have a spell in hand) the better the spells you can cast... and the more frequent you can cast them.

betterquesting.name: Pool of Etherium
betterquesting.desc:
Small White-Blue pools of shiny Liquid Etherium have generated through the world.  You most likely have passed them in your travels.  You need to bring a book and item frame to one of these pools.   When you arrive, place the item frame on a block directly next to the pool edge, and then place the book into the item frame.  Ancient Symbols will start to infuse the book, until the Arcane Compendium is summoned.

§6Tip:  This reward is your first "taste" of real Magicka. A conjured/throwable torch, §ause this in place of torches as you journey, and you will level up your magic in no time.§6 Simply select it while on your hotbar, and you will notice your Mana and Burnout bars become visible on screen.  Mana is of course, the resource used for casting spells.  If you run out, you can't cast spells until it regenerates.  Burnout is akin to "overheating"... casting spells rapidly will increase their cost.  Your burnout will "cool off" gradually and the mana cost of your spells will return to normal.

betterquesting.name: Your First Spells
betterquesting.desc:
In order to select skills and traits to master you will need an Occulus, which allows you to access your skill tree.  There are three different skill branches.  
§7§6Offensive - Used in the creation of offensive projectiles, Area of Effects, Beams or even waves of different elements.
§aUtility - This tree specializes in spells that allow you to become more efficient in your environment. Water Breathing, Slow Fall, Magical Mining, Teleporting, Magical Harvesting, Night Vision, Jump Height, etc...
§k§dDefensive - Becoming a master of defensive arts will allow you to cast spells such as Regeneration, Shield, Reflect, Healing, Mana Drain, etc...

betterquesting.name: Prescription for Inscription
betterquesting.desc:
An Inscription Table is a block that is used to write down spell recipes, the first step in spell creation. In order to use the inscription table, you must have created an Occulus and unlocked at least one spell shape and one component.  Place one of each (shape and component) into the lower slot. For Example:  Placing the shape trait "Projectile" and the component trait "Fire" into the lower slot, will produce a spell that allows you to shoot fireballs out from in front of you.

§6After all desired spell parts have been placed into the bottom slot, place a book and quill into its respective slot.  The spell recipe will transfer to the book.  Remove the book and quill to receive the new spell recipe.  Now that you have the recipe, its time to craft and spell.  For that you will need a Crafting Altar.

betterquesting.name: Whats a Wizard Without a Wardrobe
betterquesting.desc:
Spell Parchment are used in the final step of spell crafting, and also in the construction of your Inscription Table§6.  But before we get to that, lets set up a nice area for you to work in.

You will need a wide open area (suggested 8x16at minimum) for a well organized Wizards Study.  Between the books, altars, Inscription Tables, Occulus, etc... you will need a safe place to organize for your magical needs.  
§6Using a chisel you can change the look of most building blocks in the game.  Use some of these blocks we have provided, to make a Wizard's Lab for yourself.

betterquesting.name: Writers Block
betterquesting.desc:
Every spell is created from a combination of 3 traits.  

§6The "Shape" trait §b§6§bdetermines how the spell acts/moves, each spell must have a Shape trait - Is it a projectile that fires forward?  And orb that hovers in place?  A aura that you cast on yourself?  Maybe an Area of Effect that covers a wide span? 

§6A "Component" trait §bdetermines what the spell is made (composed) of.  Each spell must have a Component trait.- Is it Fire based spell? Maybe a spell made of Lightning?  There are 5 different schools of magic components, each with their own side effects and mana costs.

§6A "Modifier" trait §bis an optional addition to a spell -  Modifiers are used to enhance a trait of the spell.  It can add Damage, Duration, Potency, Range, Radius, Bounce, Piercing and many others.

betterquesting.name: Adding a Little Flavor
betterquesting.desc: Certain High Level spells may require the infusion of Neutral, Light, or Etherium in the Crafting Altar. By "linking" an Obelisk (Neutral), a Celestial Prism (Light), or Black Aurem to the Crafting Altar bock in the center of the roof using a Crystal Wrench.

betterquesting.name: Show Me What You Got
betterquesting.desc:
Using what you have learned of the Ars Magicka arts, create a Lightning Bolt spell.  It should only consist of a Shape (Projectile) and a Component (Lightning Damage).  Once you have mastered the use of the Crafting Altar, and understand how to create wild combinations of spells, you will be nearly unstoppable.  And you will need to be, as the §cEnder Guardian Titan§f will make short work of those who aren't.

§6Pro Tip: As you level up and your mana pool gets bigger you can cast much more complicated spell combinations.  There are spells that are so powerful that they will literally one-shot some game bosses.  Practice makes perfect.  Spend your Infinity Orbs wisely.  Visit §aam2.wikia.com/wiki/Spells_and_other_help §6to see some combinations others have come up with.

betterquesting.name: Crafting Altar
betterquesting.desc:
The Crafting Altar is a Multiblock structurewhere you turn your Spell Recipes into actual Spells using various runes, parchment, vinteum, etc...  The Altar §6can be crafted with different power levels indicating the strength of the spells it can create.  §fThe material used to craft the altar will determine it's power level.  This quest is the list of supplies recommended in order to make the most efficient top tier of Crafting Altar.  If you find these resources too difficult to retrieve, you can make a cheaper altar... but you may find yourself rebuilding it later.

§a§e§k§b§a§4§cTip: It is HIGHLY recommended that you refer to the Arcane Compendium book for step by step pictures on building the Crafting Altar.  There are also resources available online at §aam2.wiki.com/wiki/First_steps

betterquesting.name: Aum... are you gonna eat that?
betterquesting.desc:
Keep a small batch of Witchwood Trees growing near your base.  Not only is Witchwood used to craft certain items like the Crafting Altar, but it is the only way to obtain Aums.  Aums are flowers that only grow around the area of Witch wood trees.  Aums are frequently used in the creation of Restoration spells.

§6Pro Tip: Witchwood trees will only grow when planted on a block that is adjacent to Liquid Etherium.  The more Liquid Etherium, the better the chance of growth.  Consider planting the tree on a block of dirt with a "donut" of Liquid Etherium around the dirt.

betterquesting.name: Great Balls of Fire
betterquesting.desc: Infinity Orbs are used to purchase talents in your Skill Tree using the Occulus.  There are three tiers of rarity: Blue, Green, and Red. You may be able to find orbs in some of the more difficult Dungeon Chests or by defeating the Ars Magicka Elemental Titans.

betterquesting.name: Life Guardian
betterquesting.desc:
Difficulty: Medium

Recommended Magic Level: 45

You will need to refer to the Arcane Compendium "Bosses" Tab for instructions on summoning this Titan.  Also visit am2.wika.com/wiki/Bosses for pictures of the summoning ritual.

betterquesting.name: Arcane Guardian
betterquesting.desc:
According to the Compendium, the Arcane Guardian must be summoned using a structure called the §6Shrine of Knowledge§f. It is constructed by placing 2 pillars of bookshelves three blocks high one block apart, and placing a lectern with an Arcane Compendium in between. 

Then, place a ring of Iron Inlay directly in front of it, and throw in an arcane essence. Then, the battle will begin.

betterquesting.name: Winter Guardian
betterquesting.desc: To summon the Winter Guardian, seek out an area in the grips of winter. Place a gold inlay circle on the ground and build an effigy to the Winter Guardian in the center, Ice on top of two Blue Topaz blocks. Then create 3 snow golems close by to fuel the summoning.

betterquesting.name: Champion Of The Titans
betterquesting.desc: If is no easy feat to conquer the Ars Magicka Titans.  For you valor in the face of danger, please accept this small token of gratitude.  Offer in return, a symbol of the humble beginnings from which you started this journey... a simple mana cake will suffice.

betterquesting.name: Journey To The Core
betterquesting.desc: To summon the powerful Ender Guardian, travel to the End and create a black aurum above the middle of a 3x3 coal block square. Next, you must put a gold inlay around the entire Black Aurum. Then light fires using a Flint and Steel on the outside of the inlays on the four sides. Finally, you must pay with the sacrifice of one Ender Essence and one Eye of Ender in order to destabilize the aurum.

betterquesting.name: Fire Guardian
betterquesting.desc: To summon the Fire Guardian you  must first be in the Nether.  Build a 3x3 Obsidian frame with gold inlay on the top. Then, place a Lava Source (or a Coal Block in later versions) in the center of the Obsidian Ring. Finally, Throw 2 - 4 water essences in the lava (or on the coal block) to summon the Fire Guardian.

betterquesting.name: Meteor Madness
betterquesting.desc:
A Tier 4 or higher Blood Magic Blood Altar allows you to perorm rituals.  The §aMark Of The Falling Tower§f ritual will summon a meteor from the sky to slam into the ground.  When the smoke clears that meteor will be composed of helpful supplies, depending on the reagent you used to complete the ritual.  In addition to the usual Ore Meteors, there are 3 custom meteors you will want to summon.

§6- The Refined Storage Meteor is filled with everything you need to make a large comprehensive Storage System.  
-The Defense Meteor is filled with enough Top Teir base defense turrets and supplies to fend off even the most over buffed infernal mobs.  
-The Mystical Agriculture Metero is filled with mountains of Mystical Agriculture seeds, essence, Growth Accelerators, etc...

betterquesting.name: Advanced Generators
betterquesting.desc: Advanced Generators is a flexible multiblock power solution with options for RF/T production from late in the early game and onwards.  They are a bit expensive in this pack, but the materials are not rare.

betterquesting.name: To Make Power, You Must Spend Power
betterquesting.desc: §6§fThermal Expansion offers a wide variety of §aPower Generating Dynamos. §f One of the most useful early game options is the Magmatic Dyanamo.  It takes hot fluids and turns them into energy.  In addition to Lava, other hot fluids such as Pyrotheum can be used as well.

betterquesting.name: Energy Emitter
betterquesting.desc:
The Energy Emitter is a block used to export energy out of your Advanced Generator.  You can hook Capacitors, Conduits, or other Energy Storage/Transfer devices up to the Energy Emitter to drain any RF currently in generator.

Reward Tip:  Now that you have a reliable source of early game power, you can begin using tools that require RF if you'd like.  §6The Energizer §fblock will recharge RF tools and weapons for you.

betterquesting.name: Gas Turbine Generator
betterquesting.desc:
The Gas Turbine Generator is the most efficient of the Advanced Generators.  It is able to run on countless different fuel types from dozens of mods.  The most efficient fuel types from this pack are the EnderIO Rocket Fuel and EnderIO Fire Water.

§6Tip: Although Fire Water produces "slightly" more rf/t in the gas generators... you may find it more convenient to simply use the Rocket Fuel, since you will already be mass producing it as Airship fuel.

betterquesting.name: Gas Turbine Controller
betterquesting.desc:
Each Gas Turbine has a few required components, and then a handful of optional components that increase speed, efficiency, output, etc...

§6Tip:  The Gas Turbine requires a Single Gas Turbine Controller.  This block provides the GUI for the player to control and monitor the machine.

§c§bReward Tip:  Power Cells are an inexpensive option for transferring rf/t over long distances and dimensions. You will need a Power Cell Card linking each cell together.

betterquesting.name: Gas Turbine
betterquesting.desc:
Each Gas Turbine requires, of course, Turbines.  You can add almost an unlimited amount of Turbines, but your fuel efficiency, output ratio, etc... will suffer as you surpass reasonable amounts.§6  For your current needs, a Gas Turbine Setup consisting of 3 Steel Turbines will provide you with plenty of RF/t for the late part of the early game.

§aReward Tip:  Advancing to the later stages of power production will require you to visit The Beneath.  This is a pitch black dimension full of danger... and rare ores.  These tossable glowballs should help light your way.  Also strongly consider completing the first few quests in the Ars Kickng Magicka questline to gain the Magelight spell.

betterquesting.name: The Real Reason
betterquesting.desc:
Make a plan of where your Steam Turbine will fit.  This is a large structure with a base that is 7x7, reaching 17 blocks high.  The good news, is that the reactor that you built earlier in the quest chain is a 7x7, so you could, if you wanted, place the Steam Turbine over top of your Actively Cooled Reactor. You will of course want to leave a two block space in between so you can access the Fuel Control Rods and run pipes.
§6Tip:  The great animations of the Steam Turbine allow you to see when it is spinning at the appropriate speed, at a glance.  I would recommend having 3 sides of the Steam Turbine made from Turbine Glass, and the back, top, sides, corners made of Turbine Housing.

betterquesting.name: Blade Runner
betterquesting.desc: In order to achieve optimum efficiency, your Reactor must have 10 rows of double depth Rotary Blades.  Meaning 4 blades attached to the Rotary Shaft, and 4 blades extending from those blades... stacked up 10 times.  Above this setup of blades, will be your Induction Coil... which is simply 36 Blocks of Ludicrite encircling the Rotary shaft up to the ceiling.

betterquesting.name: What Goes In, Must Come Out
betterquesting.desc:
The goal of your Actively Cooled Reactor and Steam Turbine set up is this:
§6-A water source sends massive quantities of water into your Actively Cooled Reactor so that it can be heated up.
§b-The Actively Cooled Reactor must send 2000mb/t of that hot Steam through it's Reactor Coolant Port, over to your Steam Turbine.  
§6-The Steam Turbine Accepts the 2000mb/t  through it's own Turbine Fluid Port set to import, converts the steam to kinetic energy, and sends the resulting water back to the Actively Cooled Reactor to be recycled.

betterquesting.name: The Ludicrous Cost Of Ludicrite
betterquesting.desc:
The induction coils are the most expensive portion of the Turbine.  It is 36 blocks of highly heat conductive blocks made of a substance called ludicrite.  To achieve the most power, the most efficiently, you will need to craft 36 of these.  They will form an encasement around the top 5 sections of your Rotor Shaft.

§6Tip:  Ludicrite blocks are available in the §9§bUncommon Titan Trades §5§6tab, if you don't feel inclined to craft them yourself.

betterquesting.name: Power Capacitor
betterquesting.desc:
Its time to assemble your Advanced Generator.  Your final piece is a Power Capacitor to increase the size of the internal buffer.  The great thing about Advanced Generators is that the multiblock can be formed any way you see fit, as long as all blocks from that network are touching a piece of the network.

Once the structure is set up, hook a fluid pipe the Fluid Input Valve and begin filing your tank with Rocket Fuel, you will begin to see the generator in action

betterquesting.name: The Finished Product
betterquesting.desc:
Once your Turbine is up and running, take careful notice of the tool tips that will guide you as you hover over the GUI options.  They will show you the optimal RPMs for your turbine.  It WILL take a half hour or so for your Turbine to spin up to the proper RPMs, but it should hover at the optimal point if you have built it as the quests described.  
§bIf you are unsure of exactly how the reactor pieces fit together, you can reference the wiki, or many youtube videos available for instruction.  I will link one in particular below.  

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FxcQvoD3TJ0&feature=youtu.be&t=872§6

ENJOY YOUR NEWFOUND POWER HOUSE!

betterquesting.name: Energy Emitter and Fluid Intake
betterquesting.desc:
You need a way to feed Gas to your machine for it to burn... this is where the §6Fluid Intake Valve §fcomes into play.  Hook pipes, or machines configured to output directly to the fluid intake and it will fill the internal buffer.

Your internal buffer is generally very small; Adding §6Fuel Tank §fblocks will drastically increase the amount of fuel the buffer can hold in reserve.  When the machine is NOT producing power because the Capacitors are full and no RF is being used... the fuel will sit in the tank indefinately.

§aReward Tip: §f Actually Additions allows you to transfer items, fluids, and energy over short distances using the magic of lasers.  Place on on the The Vat or fuel processor, and the other on the Fluid Intake Valve of of the Gas Turbine Generator.

betterquesting.name: Environmental Controller for Bosses
betterquesting.desc:
Although your airship is quite handy for many uses... you may find it tough to manuever during boss battles.  When you are about to summon a difficult boss, prepare the area with things to give you an advantage. 
§6 One of these would be the Environmental Controller.  This is a block that lets you tweak the atmosphere to allow for specific things to happen.  You can tell it to damage mobs within its range, give Regeneration to friendlies within its range, give creative flight to those within its range, and more.

betterquesting.name: Dont Get It Blown Up
betterquesting.desc: There are usually large explosions accompanying any large boss battle  Cover your Envronmental controller in a material like obsidian to prevent it from being damaged or knocked off line during a fight.

betterquesting.name: Regeneration Nation
betterquesting.desc: Keep in mind that each of these modules that you place into the environmental controller costs RF/T. Some are more expensive than others.

betterquesting.name: All Your Environment Are Belong To Me
betterquesting.desc: The Environmental Controller GUI has the option to designate what coordinates you want to cover with the specific buffs you have installed.  So if you want flight to cover the entire End Island while you fight the dragon, you will need to place the controller in the center of the island, then tell the Controller to cover (for example) Y60, which is the height of the island... and X75 which is a radius of 75 blocks around the controller.  This is just an example, you will need to do some testing to make sure the area is covered as you wish.  You will notice buff particles while you are protected by the controller.

betterquesting.name: The Darkness Calls
betterquesting.desc: There are a few new biomes in the overworld that have been inected by the Abyssal Plague.  You will want to find the Darklands Mountain and the Coralium Infested Swamp biomes.  Once you have located the swamp, crack open a few of those sweet sweet Coralium Ore blocks, and bring us back a few blocks.

betterquesting.name: **Disclaimer**
betterquesting.desc:
Abyssalcraft is a large mod full of in-depth rituals and processes that give the player a sense of accomplishment when completing the gauntlet of content.  In other words... some of the tasks needed to progress through Abyssalcraft can be tedious when combined in a modpack with other Magic Mods that also require a bit of grinding.  I felt that it didn't fit the pace or theme of this modpack to include each and every aspect of those tasks in the main quest line.

 For that reason, I made the decision to offer you an abbreviated path through Abyssalcraft using a quest chain that I feel still covers all of the key themes, while bridging over some of the grinding that would otherwise need to be done.

§6Long story short:  This quest chain, and its rewards drastically shorten the usual amount of tasking required to progress through Abyssalcraft. If you would still like to complete every aspect of the mod as it was intended by the Author i.e. Crystallizing, Altar Building, Necronomicon Empowering, etc...  I encourage you to do so using the in-game documentation and abbsalcraft wiki site.

betterquesting.name: Gateway Key
betterquesting.desc:
You will need to create two Coralium Pearls by placing any combination of 9 Coralium gems in between two rows of Stone.  See NEI for details.

§7§7§7§6Coralium Ore is most commonly found in the Overworld biomes Darkland Mountains and Ocean, and of course the Abyssalcraft Biomes.

betterquesting.name: When In Rome
betterquesting.desc: Although some tools you may find in the overworld seem better, there are materials in the Abyssal Dimensions that only respond to the compounds found in Abyssal Tools.  Its wise to always keep a high tier Abyssal Pickaxe on you.

betterquesting.name: And Into The Abyss We Go
betterquesting.desc:
Shift Right Click on the ground to open the portal to the Abyssal Wasteland.  You should be aware that this place is filled with undead creatures, dragons, and zombies.  You should find a good place where you can protect yourself from them.  Make sure your armor is enchanted, your weapons are repaired, your potions are restocked, and your Airship is fueled.

§6Things to take note of in here:

-Most of the enemies  Abysslcratf are undead.  This means of healing potion that restore health to you deals damage to te enmies.
 
§f-If you combined 8 9-clusters of Coralium Gems with 1 block of Abyssal Stone, you get a chunk of Coralium, which you can smelt for Refined Coralium Ingots, allowing you to either craft, or upgrade your Abyssalnite armor/tools to Refined Coralium armor/tools.

betterquesting.name: Powerstone Tracker Hacker
betterquesting.desc:
Surrounding an Ender Pearl with Coralium Gems you can create Powerstone Trackers.  These function just like Eyes Of Ender, but point the way to the Dreadlands Infused Powerstone where§6 you will summon the Dragon Titan known as "Asorah, The Fallen".  §f

Just like using Eye of Enders to locate Overworld Strongholds, the Powerstone Tracker will float in the direction of the nearest stronghold, then fall to the ground or dissappear.  The stronghold may be far away, so dont neglect to pick the Tracker's off the ground and reuse them.

betterquesting.name: Summoning The Beast
betterquesting.desc:
Once you begin seeing Abyssal Brick walls, you have found the stronghold.  Plan ahead on where you want to fight the Titan. You must set up the summoning ritual described in your Abyssal Wasteland version of the Necronomicon.  This involves placing 9 pieces of Abyssal Cobblestone into a "clock" formation as such:

§9 §6§d       O
    O      O
   
  O    O    O 

    O      O
        O 

§f(If that diagram is too horrible, consult the Rituals section of the Necronomicon)
Shift+Click the center piece of Abyssal Cobblestone to form the Altar.  Once the pillars have formed:

§6-You must place a Gold Ingot on the 12, 3, 6, and 9 oclock positions. 
-Place a Transmutation Gem at the 2oclock position.  
-A bucket of Liquid Coralium at the 4 oclock position
-An enchanting table at the 7 oclock position.  

§fOnce everything is in place, sweep the area for any mobs or Spectral Dragons, and get rid of them... or they will heal the Dragon during the fight.  Then Shift+Right click the center pillar of the altar with your Abyssal Wasteland Necronomicon one more time to summon the Titan.  Use potions, buff apples, and food as needed.

betterquesting.name: Packing For The Trip
betterquesting.desc:
You have a few tasks to plan ahead for while you are in the Abyssal Wastelands.  Or you  may find yourself having to trek back and forth quite a bit.

§6The Gold Ingots, Bucket, Enchant Table, and the Transmutation Gem will be used in the ritual to summon the Dragon Titan.

You are recieving an updated edition of the Necronomicon that will explain some of the Abyssal Wasteland specific details. 

The Ender Pearls will be crafted with Coralium Gems in order to track the Stronghold where the ritual will take place.

betterquesting.name: Defeat The Titan, Asorah The Fallen
betterquesting.desc:
§6Defeat Asorah and retrieve the Dark Titan Relic she drops.

§fFor your bravery and Valor you have earned an Uncommon Titan Rune.  You can visit the Titan Rune Trade In tab now, or save it for later.  

The Asorah's, Gateway Key will point us towards our next Titan, but you may want to stop back at your base to restock.  It won't be an easy fight.

betterquesting.name: Do You Need a Hand With That?
betterquesting.desc:
Once you have found the Dreadlands Mountain Biome, clear the area of any Chagaroth Fists... their appearance means you are close to your destination.

§7§6Dig down to ground level 40 in the Mountain, and place the§a bottom piece §6of the Chagroth Altar exactly on Y40.  You will get a message if the altar is not at the right height.

betterquesting.name: Denizens of the Dark
betterquesting.desc: Familiarize yourself with the inhabitants of the Dreadlands.  As you hunt these creatures, look for a Dreadlands Mountain Biome.  Thats our next destination.

betterquesting.name: The Wall That Talks Back
betterquesting.desc:
Placing the top portion of the Altar onto the bottom, while at Y40, and clicking it will transfer you to the lair of Cha'Garoth.
§6This is likely to be the most challenging fight you have faced yet.  Cha'Garoth has over 2000 health, the room he is fought in is cramped, and there is a constant horde of Spawn of Cha'Garoth biting at your ankles.

§aTips:  If you have recieved or can make any of the Mystical Agriculture Buff Apples, they are helpful in keeping you alive.  Holy Hand Grenades work wonders to clear out the countless Spawn of Cha'Garoth that spawn throughout the fight.

betterquesting.name: The Final Abyssal Titan
betterquesting.desc: You receivd an egg to Spawn Sactoth, the final Titan of Abyssal Craft.  This is optional, as the dimenion for that boss has not been finished or releaseed ino the pack yet.  If you would like to summon and defeat him, there will be an Uncommon Titan Rune available to use in our Titan Rune trade area.  The egg is one time use... make sure you are ready.  The boss is fought in the same manner as Sactoth.

betterquesting.name: Where'd All The Cows Go?
betterquesting.desc:
The Titan Cloud City known as The Aether holds many valuable assets.  We will need to conquer the two Titan Entities of the domain to secure these delicassies.  Among the treasures are livestock with a rich and fatty meat.  The Aether Livestock (Flying Cows, Phygs, and Sheepuffs) drop§6 Cooking Fat§f that is a tasty substitute for Cooking Oil.   We should secure a stable of Aether Livestock, as this will make getting Cooking Oil for your Care Package preparations much easier in the end game.  
 
Prepare yourself, we must venture to the Sky Titan land known as §6The Aether.

betterquesting.name: I Believe You Can Fly
betterquesting.desc: If you weren't aware already, The Aether is a cloud city... lots of floating islands that can be anywhere from 20 to 60 blocks apart.  I would strongly recommend securing your first airship before venturing to the Aether to secure our livestock.  Your other option would be a hanglider, and some disposable blocks to get the height needed for the glide.  Either way, if you fall out of the Aether, you will land back down here on earth.... hopefully in water.

betterquesting.name: Dimensional Robbery
betterquesting.desc:
So heres the plan... we sneak in... we plunder their dungeons of any worthy goods... we grab a healthy variety of their livestock into Soul Vials... and make it back to earth before anyone's the wiser. Lets hope our plan goes that smoothly...

§6Enchanted Aether Grass works much like Fertalized Soil... but which one is faster? Aether Berries are the prime breeding reagent for Aether Livestock

betterquesting.name: While We're Here...
betterquesting.desc:
There are three dungeon types in The Aether.  Titans reside in two of them.  The Valkaryie Queen in the Silver Dungeon, and the Sun Spirit in the Gold Dungeon.  They are the only ones standing between you and returning to earth with your spoils.   Seek them out, and "ask their permission" to rob their lands.

§6Look for large more-spherical islands.  These are usually holding a golden dungeon at the very core.  There should be an entrance along the side of the sphere.  Find the Sun Spirit at the core of the sphere.  Right click to talk to him, then bring out the weapons when he is distracted.

betterquesting.name: All the Colors Of The Rainbow
betterquesting.desc:
It may be a bit more challenging to locate the variety of Moa that you will want to have for breeding.  Especially the very illusive Black Moa.  Venture out and see what colors you can find.  And while you are at it... clear the area of a few pesks.

§6Pro Tip:  Filter blocks only allow specific entities to pass through them.  A Filter Block for "Baby" animals may come in handy for your livestock farms.

betterquesting.name: Sheepuff?  I barely know her!
betterquesting.desc: Because Aether Animals are used to the free roaming flight environment beyond the clouds.  You may need to make certain accomodations them.  Possibly an enclosure with a lit glass roof on it?

betterquesting.name: Valkyrie Vengeance
betterquesting.desc: The Valkyrie race of the Aether has not allied with the Grimoire of Gaie Valkyries as of yet.  But that matters not.  They must be eliminated if your homeland is to have safe journey to this realm.  Travel to the dungeon where the Valkyrie Queen resides.  Dispatch ten of her Valkyrie underlings in order to anger her.  Then she will be willing to face you head on.

betterquesting.name: Mimicry Is the Best Form Of Flattery
betterquesting.desc:
The halls of the Aether dungeons are riddled with traps and treasure.  It is worth the risk however.  Break through the horde of traps to secure all that you desire.

§6Tip:  Did you know you can tame and breed Owls?  They will automatically attack any spiders in the area, and their eggs are highly sought after delicacies back in your homelands.  §a Breed Owls with Spider Eyes.

betterquesting.name: All Hail The Queen
betterquesting.desc: Right click on the Valkyrie queen after you have retrieved 10 Victory Medeals from her Underlings. This will provoke her to face you!

betterquesting.name: Better Than An Anvil, Half The Fat
betterquesting.desc: The Actually Additions Item Repairer does just that.  It restores the durability of a weapon at the cost of RF instead of materials.  So if you get your hands on an item made from materials that are tough to come by, this machine is the answer to all of your problems.

betterquesting.name: Infinite Lava Source
betterquesting.desc:
You can always use a bucket of lava, and with the Lava Factory, you will always have one available.

§6Tip:  The Lava Factory "multiblock" is created by having the Mob Factory block on the ground, the each of the 4 Casing blocks above and to the sides of the factory... creating a bowl like structure.  This machine will require RF to generate lava.  Pumps, including Extra Utility transfer pipes with Mining upgrades can be used to suck up the lava.

betterquesting.name: Craft At The Tip Of Your Fingers
betterquesting.desc: Keeping this in your inventory will allow you to open a crafting table anywhere at any time from your bags.

betterquesting.name: Double Venti Mocha Latte Frappe
betterquesting.desc: The Actually Additions Coffee Maker is very similar to the Minecraft Potion system.  There are unique combinations and effects that can be achieved.  Experiement and refer to the Actually Additons wiki for more information.
No Description

betterquesting.name: Plan For The Worst
betterquesting.desc:
You have a small window in the beginning to make your base safe.  After that, expect that very dangerous mobs will have increased AI, the ability to break down walls, and hordes to ambush your location relentlessly. There are two ways to deal with this.  You can fortify your base as best as possible,  or you can make a small battle tower, away from your base, where you can spend rough nights and blood moons.  A small 4x4x4 room made out of Reinforced Stone, with slots in each wall to swing your swords through. Maybe some lava to fend off pesky critters

§6Pro Tip:  If you choose not to make a seperate Blood Moon Bunker, use these materials to solidify your base.  If you do choose the bunker, make it far enough away, that your base is not chunk loaded during the blood moon.  This offers additional security against property damage.

betterquesting.name: Choose Your Path Wisely
betterquesting.desc: Take a good look at the Titan Rune Trade Ins before planning your path of approach to the Care Packages.  You may decide it is wiser to spendy our Titan Runes on items that will increase your efficiency at producing more items... for example Growth Accelerators and Quarries.  It may prove quicker in the long run to improve your efficiency from the beginning.

betterquesting.name: Gettin Wood, Indeed
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: You Got Enough To Feed The Needy
betterquesting.desc: The expedition missions to discover more favorable lands, safe from the Titans, has put a lot of resource stress on your homeland.  They need provisions, and they need them now.  Send them a Care Package of food to help feed the needy.

betterquesting.name: You Got Enough To Feed The Needy
betterquesting.desc: The expedition missions to discover more favorable lands, safe from the Titans, has put a lot of resource stress on your homeland.  They need provisions, and they need them now.  Send them a Care Package of food to help feed the needy.

betterquesting.name: Fluid, Fluid Storage
betterquesting.desc:
You will most likely need to develop a storage system for mass quantities of fluids as you  begin the Care Package dailies.  iTanks for great for this purpose, as they are modular, and grow as you stack more on top of each other.

ProTip:  The RFTools Builder block is a builder, quarry, relocator, and pump all in one.  For your purpose, you may need to to suck up Care Package fluids.

betterquesting.name: Whats In Store For You
betterquesting.desc:
If you are going to tackle the Care Package Dailies, you will need Object Submission Stations (OSS).  These are kiosks that can accept the care package contents, keeping track of your progress and triggering the completion when all of the contents have been submitted, just as it would if you had submitted them through the menu manually. You can submit both fluids and items through the OSS.

Tip:  You can have multiple OSS, each accepting contents for a different quest, or even sub-tasks of the same quest.

betterquesting.name: Welcome To The Jungle
betterquesting.desc:
Care Package Dailies can be considered "Side Quests" or "New Game Plus" content for this modpack.  None of these quests are expected or required to complete the main pack content. If you are planning to complete all of these, you will find that some of the quest tasks become downright ridiculous.  These are meant to give the pack rats, automation addicts, and sadistic achievement hunters a reward for their endeavors.  For those of us that may not have that level of engagement, it should be enough to just occassionally check quests against the items sitting in our storage system that we have in bulk.

§6TL;DR - You can either build big automated processes to complete these quests... or just occassionally cross reference your storage with these quests, and complete what you happen to be able to... leave what you can't.
