betterquesting.name: Uncommon Rune
betterquesting.desc:
Your good deeds have netted you Titan Runes!  You can use them in certain crafting recipes, or trade them in for rewards. 

§6Tip:  The Valkaryie Armor Set from The Aether is the full Militant Garb worn by the Aether Protectors themselves.  The full set allows for short bursts of hovered flight, fall protection, and slow fall.  In addition, the Lance weapon has been given additional damage enchantment to accompany it's built in increase in melee range.

betterquesting.name: Uncommon Rune
betterquesting.desc:
Your good deeds have netted you Titan Runes!  You can use them in certain crafting recipes, or trade them in for rewars. 

§6Tip:  This very powerful Mage Armor is the Magic Caster's dream.  The set bonus giees 30% Mana regeneration speed, the different status effects, high level custom enchants,and the legendary Nature Scythe, that has been specially crafted with additional damage for you.

betterquesting.name: Uncommon Rune
betterquesting.desc:
Your good deeds have netted you Titan Runes!  You can use them in certain crafting recipes, or trade them in for rewards. 

§6Tip:  This full set of Dark Iron armor has already been FULLY EMPOWERED for you.  All of the special abilities have been unlocked.  And in fitting with the usual theme of this modpack, the sword has been rebalanced to compete better with later game items. There is a new Dark Knight.

betterquesting.name: Uncommon Rune
betterquesting.desc:
Your good deeds have netted you Titan Runes!  You can use them in certain crafting recipes, or trade them in for rewards. 


§6Tip:  Teleportation at your finger tips.

betterquesting.name: Uncommon Rune
betterquesting.desc:
Your good deeds have netted you Titan Runes!  You can use them in certain crafting recipes, or trade them in for rewards. 

§6Tip:  Extra Storage in a Pinch

betterquesting.name: It's Over 9000!
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: I Might, I Might Not
betterquesting.desc: The Best A Man Can Get

betterquesting.name: Aren't You a Sharp One
betterquesting.desc: Yes, you read it right, Sharpness XXX... an additional 15 base Attack Power on your sword.

betterquesting.name: There Can Be Only One
betterquesting.desc: Fully Charged set of Draconic Weapons

betterquesting.name: Charmed, Im Sure
betterquesting.desc: As the name implies, this charm makes you basically an immortal coward. Shift right click to anchor it to a location, and then just keep it in your inventory somewhere. When you get below 20% health it will teleport you to the location that you set. There is a cool-down shown by durability

betterquesting.name: Onyx, the Dark Diamond
betterquesting.desc:
Onyx, also called the Dark Diamond has been discovered in the Nether in limited quanities.  It is considered to be the strongest of the Molten metals, and will allow you to craft Tinkers Construct weapons that rival those of old.  You will definately want to take a look at the statistics of the Tinker's weapons vs. the Crafted Weapons to guage how you want your end-game arsenal to look.

§6Tip:  Some of the more difficult monsters in this pack are heavily shielded in armor.  Unfortunately brute force will not work well against Armor.  The Tinker's Construct Rapiers do Armor Piercing damage, so it is advised that you consider keeping at least one available for use in the end game.

betterquesting.name: The Brahemic Exchange
betterquesting.desc:
In an attempt to understand the mass hoarding of resources that Minecraft players long for, I once asked a man, 

§6"What can you do with 2,000,000 of something, that you can't do with 2,000?!"

§fIn his infinite wisdom he replied, 

§a"It's not about the doing... its about the having."


§fWell... challenge accepted.


I have no quest reward that would be sufficient for such a task.  I can simply say, if you complete this most audacious of feats....§c "You win."

betterquesting.name: Everlasting Abilities
betterquesting.desc:
Sometimes, you may want to have certain abilities, without having to carry around different potion bottles, wearing specific armor or using specific tools. This mod allows you to have persistent abilities, that stay on you after you die, and you don't have to carry around specific items.

You should have recieved an ability bottle when you first logged into this world.  If you have misplaced it, here is another.  This is your main interface for Abilities.

betterquesting.name: Respek Mah Athoritae
betterquesting.desc:
Each abiity till cost a specific amount of XP in order to equip it.  Some abilities are more expensive than others.  You must choose which abilities are most important to you, and make adjustments as necessary.

Some abilities are so impactful that you will want to swap them in or out frequently.  Fighting a tough boss with high armor?  Use the Poison and Wither totems to drain it's health whenever you are within range, and the Weakness Totem to make it's attacks more manageable.

betterquesting.name: Natural Absorbtion
betterquesting.desc: In order to combat the countless enemies in your path, scientist back home have devised a process in which you can gain an energy shield to absorb incoming damage.  Using the EnderIO Enchanter or Enchanting Table you can apply Absorption to your armor that will increae your shield by an additional 20 damage.

betterquesting.name: Theres Always A Cost
betterquesting.desc: The ability to absorb incoming damage is such a powerful function, that it can not be delegated lightly.  In order to ensure you can handle such responsibility, each time you apply a book, it will cost Experience levels to apply it,  and Lapis Lazuli to make the book.  This shouldn't be a problem for a hero of your caliber. Surely your Mob Farms and/or Mystical Agriculture plants can secure plenty of XP for you.

betterquesting.name: What a Creep
betterquesting.desc:
Mystical Agriculture is a great way to grow resources, including mob drops.  You will need a hefty amount of Gunpowder to make things like Rocket Fuel in this pack, so lets start with Creeper seeds.

§6Tip:  Slaying mobs with the Soulium Dagger has a chance to make them drop their mob "chunk" which is used in the creation of seeds for that mob type.  You are in luck, as the Soulium Dagger provided in the above quest has a little extra punch to it.

betterquesting.name: They Even Have Armor
betterquesting.desc: Msytical Agriculture Armor is very strong, and was previously one of the go to sets for early game creative flight.  Unfortunately, the weather in this region causes the purity of the seeds to suffer slightly enough that the armor no longer has the ability for flight.  All of the other armor benefits are still applicable, and the armor is comparable to the armor plus high tier options.

betterquesting.name: Withe Or Not
betterquesting.desc: Using Enderman seeds, it is possile create a safe-room for your Wither Killingfarm

betterquesting.name: Minefactory is Your Factory
betterquesting.desc:
Minefactory allows you to automate process of all sorts.  Farming, breeding, mob farms, and even mass enchanting are just a few examples.  This will be key to sending care packages back home in a timely manner.

Plastic is used in a wide variety of the Minefactoy recipes, and you may want to grab some rubber tree saplings to make sure you always have a healthy supply available.

betterquesting.name: The Butcher's Bakery
betterquesting.desc:
The Refridgerators are the main storage space of the CFB Kitchen.  They can be stacked two high, and dyed if desired.  Any food or ingredients inside of ANY of the storage units touching the Kitchen (including Refridgerators, Cabinets, Tool Racks, etc...) will be networked together, and taken into consideration when recipes are suggested.

§6Tip:  Your operation can be as large as you want.  It's not uncommon for CFB Kitchens to have a dozen Refridgerator units hidden under the maain kitchen, storing the massive quantities of food items they are using.  As long as they are touching at least one item from the main kitchen, they will all be within the network.  You can even control the importing and exporting of food in the refridgerators with Refined Storage busses.

betterquesting.name: All Animals Were Harmed In The Filming...
betterquesting.desc:
Assuming you will want to breed Pigs, Cows, Chickens, AND Sheep, you will need a total of 8 pens, placed in pairs with each other... back to back, resembling a " 8 "  made of fencing.  The diagram below demonstrates the set up.

+ = Fence
B = Breeder
C = Chronotyper
D = Grinder

++++++++++++
+       +       +
+       §aC       G
§f+       +       +
+++§aB§f++++++++

betterquesting.name: Gordon Ramstein Would Be Proud
betterquesting.desc: The Cooking Table is like your CFB Book in Block Form.  Whenever you want to view what meals can be prepared open the Cooking Table GUI.  You can select the meals from a list and the ingredients will automatically be used from your storage, and presented to you.

betterquesting.name: Meteor For Meat
betterquesting.desc:
Once you have reached the Tier 4 Blood Altar in Blood Magic, you will have access to summon the Refined Storage Meteor.  That will open up a world of automation for your Cooking For Blockheads kitchen. 

§6Tip:  Due to the sheer volume of farm goods and resources, it would be advised to have a completely seperaate RS network for your Agriculture.  This will simplify the importing and exporting of all of your farm goods.

betterquesting.name: Frying Pan Into The Fire
betterquesting.desc: Many items you make will need to have some of the ingredients cooked.  The oven will automatically queue and cook the items you order.  Make sure to keep both cooked and uncooked foods in your storage to see the full list of available recipes, as some will require only one or the other.

betterquesting.name: Hells Kitchen
betterquesting.desc:
Any good farm needs a place to store their goods.  Constructing a "kitchen" will provide you with food storage, water source, cooking tools, and more at your fingertips.   Clicking on the Cooking Table of your Kitchen will provide you a list of all food items you can craft with the items currently in your inventory, including the storage blocks attached to the kitchen (Refridgerators, cabinets, and chests attached to the kitchen will be included.  Talk about convenient!

§6Tip:  Here are some decorative blocks to put together a kitchen of your choice.  Leave plenty of space!

betterquesting.name: Preventing Problems
betterquesting.desc:
One small problem with automating the breeding of livestock, is that it takes a lot longer for a baby to grow up, than it does for adults to have more babies.  Meaning, you will slowly have more and more babies sitting in the Growth Pen waiting to grow.  At some point this could reach really high numbers, eventually causing lag and TPS issues.  Take care to make sure your pens are always at a moderate population, and cull any over stuffed livestock.
§6   You can automate this by using a Veterinary Station to speed up the growth process of your baby animals. §fThis will of course increase your overall meat production as well.  You will want to set up an automated crafter that fills the syringes, sends them to the Vet station, and then collects the used Syringes back into the crafter.

betterquesting.name: Here's My Counter Offer
betterquesting.desc: Counters are similar to refridgerators in that they have storage space which is connected to the food network for recipes.

betterquesting.name: I Guess This IS a Kitchen Sink Pack
betterquesting.desc: The sink is an incredible source of infinite water.  Incredible, because it is powerful enough to provide full water flow to an Extreme Reactor (as you will see later).  For now though, lets just worry about providing water for recipes that need it.

betterquesting.name: Put That Vat To Use!
betterquesting.desc:
Unlike Most modpacks where you B-line for Angel Wings, the Titans have ensured things won't be that easy here.  But don't fret, we have supplied you with flight options as you progress.  Vies Airships come in 3 Varieties. There is rumored to be a forth, slightly faster experimental Airship available, but Scientists back home will need some care packages to fund their research.   §6Rocket Fuel is a key fluid for both your airship, and your Advanced Generators.  You will want to make some hefty quantities in order to never be short on supply.  

§aTip:  JEI is glitched on the viesoline recipes, and shows an outdated recipe using redstone and coal.  The new recipe is the one using rocket fuel, and gives 4 times more output.

betterquesting.name: Pass The Gas
betterquesting.desc:
Now that you have a few pieces of Viesoline Airship Fuel, lets get started on your first Airship.  I know, she isn't much to look at right now... but at least you get to pick the color, and the next version is sure to be a more modern model.

§6Tip: Due to an error in JEI an outdated recipe for Viesoline shows up.  The correct recipe is the Rocket Fuel recipe that has a 4 pellet ouput.

betterquesting.name: Its Getting Electrifying Now!
betterquesting.desc:
Ok, so its time to step up to the big boy.  The end-game power generation. The Good stuff.  The Extreme Reactor Turbine is such a beast, that it uses another Reactor just to feed it steam. It's not cheap, but it's well worth the exponential increase in RF/T it will generate.

§6Tip:  In order to make the most efficient, yet biggest, Steam Turbine, we will first need to prepare our old Passively Cooled Reactor for the change.  Make sure that all of your capacitor banks are full on power... since your reactor may be down for a short while.

betterquesting.name: Measure Twice, Cut Once
betterquesting.desc:
To avoid having to do large renovations for your end game power generation, consider the layout of your Reactors and where the future turbines will go.  As mentioned, the appropriate size of the Reactor to power a fully efficient Turbine is 7x7x5.  In addition, the size of the future Steam Turbine will be an EXTRA 7x7x17.  Since both bases are 7x7, you could place one over the other (with a few blocks of crawl space in between), for an epic looking TOWER OF POWER.  But the choice is yours. §6 The only absolute requirement for the placement of your Reactor and for your Turbine, is that you can send Steam and Water back and forthe between the two structures.

§aTip: Also consider how much power you would like to produce.  Is 100k rf/t reasonable for your needs?  Or would you like to make additional space for more reactors, advanced, generators, etc...

betterquesting.name: Mobs Drop It Like Its Hot
betterquesting.desc: There is a group back home that would love to get their hands on this care package.

betterquesting.name: Time To Upgrade Ya
betterquesting.desc:
As usual, we would like to better prepare you for the elevated level of difficulty present in this modpack.  Deposit the Sentient Sword you crafted, and I shall enchant it for you.

§6Tip: §fThe Sentient Sword may seem week at first... but it gains damage as you collect Demonic Will into your Tartaric Gem.

betterquesting.name: Robin Hood If He Could
betterquesting.desc: Its important to make sure your gear is enchanted with an optimal setup going forward.  In addition to having a very high armor rating, the Manyullan armor set also comes with §cResistance II§f... making you nearly indestructible.

betterquesting.name: Its Greased Lightning
betterquesting.desc: Now that you have begun producing energy, you feel a presence has been watching you closely.  After a bit of investigation, you realize the Lightning Guardian wants to take your power for his own.  You can't let that happen, and must summon him and destroy him before he can ruin your plans.

betterquesting.name: IC2 Of You
betterquesting.desc:
Industrial Craft 2 is an all inclusive mod that offers everything from Ore Duplication to Nuclear Power.  Advanced Solar Panels is an IC2 addon that incorporates versatile Solar Panel energy for EU production.  IC2 will be a big part of your Care Package production, and other end game priorities. 

§6§9§cKey IC2 Goals:
§6--Mass Fabricator - §aThe Primary Source for Iridium, an important ingredient in Nuclear and Solar energy production.
§6--Recycler Station - §aTakes random materials and turns them into Scrap which speeds up the Mass Fabrication process.
§6--Molecular Transformer -  §aPossibly the most powerful machine in the pack.  It has the ability to one item into another at the cost of EU.  Turn Copper into Titan Runes, turn Gold into Sunnarium, turn Irom into Iridium, etc...  A setup containing one ore more Molecular Transformers will be crucial to your end game success.

betterquesting.name: You Have To Spend Power, To Make Power
betterquesting.desc:
In order to make some of the machines necessary for processing of IC2 (and some other mod items) you will need to craft some temporary means of power generation.  Don't worry though, the output on these generators have been tweaked slightly to allow them to be less of a burden than they normall would be.

§6Tip:  Geothermal Generators create and transfer EU at twice the rate of regular Generators.  Transfer rate of EU is much more important in IC2 than in other mods.

betterquesting.name: Formal Metal Forming
betterquesting.desc: Metal formers are a great way to quickly produce plates, cans, and casings.  They can also be automated.

betterquesting.name: I Can Can With The Best Of Them
betterquesting.desc: You will find the fluid/solid canning machine is a very convenient way to make "buckets" of fluid that can stack.  It is also a key process in the creation of IC2 Coolant, which you will revisit as part of your Care Package quests.

betterquesting.name: First The Canner, Now The Scanner
betterquesting.desc: In order to decipher the proper combination of UU Matter required to duplicate an item, the item must first be scanned.  This process requires the IC2 Scanner.  Once the Scanner has processed an item, the pattern can be stored on a Memory Crystal, and place in Pattern Storage to be accessed by the Replicator when necessary.

betterquesting.name: Compressing The Right Buttons
betterquesting.desc:
The compressor does just what it sounds like... it condenses a small stack of items, into one solid unit.  This includes plates, compounds, and eve Coal!  Ever wonder what happens when you compress coal enough?

§6Tip:  Overclocker upgrades can drastically increase the speed of IC2 machines.  With enough of them, operations complete in a blink of an eye.  But be careful, the EU consumption goes up a LOT as you add upgrades.

betterquesting.name: IC2 Is Going Green?
betterquesting.desc:
The Recycler is a machine that accepts common items, recycles them with a chance to produce scrap.  Nine Scrap can be combined to make a scrap box, which you can open for a studpidly useless item.  You can also place the scrap or scrap box into a Mass Fabricator.  This is extremely important, and we will discuss more on why that is when you craft the Fabricator.  For now, expect that processing scrap is an important part of end game efficiency.

§6Tip:  I have good news and bad news.  The bad news is: You can not just feed cobblestone into the Recyclers like you did in previous packs.  The Recycling plant has blacklisted it. The good news is:  The Recyclers still take nearly all other types of material. AND! New ways to produce scrap have been developed, so you should not see a change in production.  View your Clash Of The Titans tip guide for more information.

betterquesting.name: Mass Fabulous Fabricator
betterquesting.desc: UU Matter is a dense syrup of creativity.  Scanning certain rare resourse, you can then reconstruct them out of UU Matter.  This is one of very few ways to gain more of certain resources that have long since dissappeared from the world, like Iridium. In order to form a drop off UU Matter, the Mass Fabricator must focus extreme amounts of energy into it's core.  This can be quite time and Energy intensive.  However, adding random pieces of matter via Scrap or Scrapboxes, you can greatly speed up this process.

betterquesting.name: Not The Blade Runner Replicants
betterquesting.desc: The Replicator takes patterns from the Pattern Storage (situated next to it) and replicates the item on the pattern using UU Matter.  UU Matter is not cheap, so you want to make sure this process is reserved for the rarest of materials.

betterquesting.name: Ready To Rock?
betterquesting.desc: So you have secured the necessary materials needed to move forward?  The next tier is the Advanced Solar Panel.  A slightly beefier version of the base solar panel.  Don't worry, this is the last 60x Solar panel part of this quest line.

betterquesting.name: You Can Grow WHAT?
betterquesting.desc: You are about to open the doorway for a level of automation only dreamed of back in your homeland.  This land is ripe for growing crops of all sorts... even Ore crops.

betterquesting.name: Inferium By Name, Inferium By Reputation
betterquesting.desc:
Inferium seeds and Inferium Essence are just the base level of component for Mystical Agriculture.  You will need literally hundreds of thousands of these if you plan on completing everything in this pack to its fullest.
§6The Inferium Seeds come in Tiers, each tier gives you a higher output of Inferium Essence.  When you get a decent stock of one tier, begin converting the seeds into the next tier up.  Your growth accelerators are limited, so you can't afford to waste them on lower tier seeds.

betterquesting.name: Compacting And Storage
betterquesting.desc: You have many options when it comes to organizing your Mystical Essence and drops.  If you have already achieved the Tier 4 Blood Altar and called down your Refined Storage system, you can set up autocrafting to ensure you always have what you need in stock.  Assuming you have not done this yet, a set up of crafters is an easy way to convery your essence into resources automatically.

betterquesting.name: RF, Never Leave Home With Out It
betterquesting.desc:
The wirelss charge will automatically charge any RF based items within a 64 block radius.  No more worrying that you forgot to charge your magnet before you left home.

§6Reward Tip: The Handheld Filler is an item added by Actually Additions. It is used to fill an area full of a specific block. Shift right-clicking a block will pick it as the block to be used in the filling. Right-clicking the first block, holding, and releasing on the second block will start the filling process (the first two corner blocks of the final structure must be placed). This formation can be in a flat plane or a cuboid.

betterquesting.name: Do You Mind If I Bind?
betterquesting.desc: You will find that the Soul Binder is a great tool for bending the life will of entities that you come across.  From harnessing the instincts of a zombie in a controller... or binding souls to a broken spawner.

betterquesting.name: Whether The Wither Will Or Not
betterquesting.desc:
One of the problems with mob farms, is that everything seems to explode.  This can cause a problem when trying to run pipes or hoppers into an area to pick up mob drops... sometimes they end up broken and destroyed. 
     The§6 Dark Utilities Ender Hopper §fhelps eliminate that problem by being able to teleport any drops within a 7 block radius through walls/blocks.  So you can hide your Ender Hopper behind blast/wither proof walls, and it will teleport the mob drops directly into the chest it sits on.

§aReward Tip:  Lapis Lamps from Random Things give off a light level of 15, but DO NOT interfere with the ability for mobs to spawn.  Perfect for keepin an eye on your mob farms.

betterquesting.name: A New Level Of Weaponry
betterquesting.desc:
You will notice, that as you pick up and craft weapons through the world, they are rated for quality.  This quality ranges from§9 "Rare",§d "Ultra Rare",§6 'Legendary",§c and "Archaic".§f The quality not only increases the durability and damage, but it also allows you more options for upgrading the weapons.

§fBy harnessing the Titan energy that taints the experience you pick up from mob kills, you can upgrade the power of your weapons.  Using a particular weapon in battle will eventually level it up.   By pressing the "L"key (by default), you will pull up the "Levels" mod UI.  This UI will allow you to spend the points you have accrued on POWERFUL weapon traits.  Elemental damage, Chain effects, etc... These upgrades are crucial for turning you into a force to be reckoned with.  Do not forget to apply your points each time you see the notification that one has levelled up.

betterquesting.name: Everything Has a Purpose
betterquesting.desc:
In most modpacks, there is a lot of stuff that just gets thrown away because it has no use.  We can't afford such luxuries here in Craft Of The Titans. We need all of the resources we can get.  Usually, damaged armor and weapon drops from your Mob Farms would just get filtered into a trashcan.  Our scientists back home have devised a way to put them to great use.  

§6All Vanilla Armor and Weapon drops, regardless of damage level, can be converted into scrapboxxes, simply by placing them into the crafting table.  §fSince there are no cobblestone generators in this pack, this is a key way to provide a steady stream of scrap to your Mass Fabricators.  You will most likely want to set up an automatic system, that retrieves the drops from the mob farm, crafts them into scrap, and sends it to your mass fabricator.

betterquesting.name: Lucky Block Buster
betterquesting.desc:
This Hazmat suit is designed to offer the max protection agains the woes of the Irish Lucky block.  It offers protection against Dynamite, Lava, Falling, and Suffocation/Drowning.  It may not save your life in all situations, but it's the best option you have.

§6These suits have very low durability.  So although they are great protection, they will probably leave you naked if you attempt to use them for normal combat.  These are meant as a disposable, one-time gift from your loving subscriber, to protect you from those less scrupulous viewers.

betterquesting.name: Somebunny Loves You
betterquesting.desc: For the subscriber that would prefer to be a longer lasting part of your gameplay.  These are the Rare Aerbunnies often found in the Aether.  These lovely creatures need a place to call home, and your subscriber just sponsored one.

betterquesting.name: I Can Fly Twice As High
betterquesting.desc:
Each of the three Airships has a slightly different recipe.  However, all of them will require a combination of Engines, Ignitions, Balloons, and Chassis.

§6Tip:  Dismounting in mid-air is an unfortunately common mistake.  Try to get used to the controls, and change them to suit your needs, or you may "fall" into some problems.  Keep in mind, if you Airship falls into Lava or Water, it is likely to be destroyed.

betterquesting.name: Dont Look Down
betterquesting.desc: Your Airship does NOT have a lot of health.  Keep in mind that a well aimed Arrow, or misplaced fireblast can knock you out of the sky in a heart beat.

betterquesting.name: Who Framed Amelia Aerhart?
betterquesting.desc:
Your frame can be made out of any variety of materials.  However, the material you make your frame out of determins the Maximum Velocity and Altitude that your Airship can reach.  The best frame you can currently make is most likely the Obsidian.  This will allow you to soar up to y230 and has a speed multiplier of 1.6x.  

§6As you secure more resources you can upgrade your Air Ship's frame simply by Shift+Left Clicking the new frame onto the Airship.  This will of course allow you to fly higher and faster.

betterquesting.name: Put Your Hot Air To Good Use
betterquesting.desc: You can further upgrade your airship by accessing the main panel in the ship.  Read the ugprades carefully, as each one may have an effect on your speed or fuel consumption.

betterquesting.name: Accessorize Your Ride
betterquesting.desc:
Your airship is combat ready... meaning you can fire arrows from it, drop potions, throw grenades, swing your weapon, break blocks, etc...  You are not limited.§6  HOWEVER, you will want to be very careful that you do not accidentally hit your frame or balloon while you are inside of it.  You may very well break the ship out from under you.

§bTip:  The colorizer will allow you to spice up your ship's balloon color.  You will receive a Pattern upgrade on your next quest.  These items should allow you to make an Airship that is truly one of a kind.

betterquesting.name: I Believe You Can Fly
betterquesting.desc:
Now that your airship has been crafted, the world is your Oyster.  This will make finding dungeons much easier, as you will be able to spot their entry brickways from the Air.  You can also transport mobs in your Airship... sometimes not by choice.  Use this tool to pluck them out safely, if an arrow to the head would be too harsh.

§6Tip:  These patterns will further customize your ship.  Don't worry, you can always craft a different one, if you choose to.

betterquesting.name: Luxury Even In The Worst Circumstances
betterquesting.desc:
The EnderIO inventory panel offers most of the accomodations of the bigger Storage System panels, at the cost of Nutrient Distillation.  And it works with Colossal Chests and Storage Drawers.  Just slap an Inventory Conduit onto the Chest Interface  or Drawer Controller, place a Remote Awareness Upgrade into it, and then place your EnderIO Inventory Panel at the other end.  VOILA!  You can now extract, insert, and even craft items at your panel.

§6Tip:  You can either pump Nutrient distillation into the back of your panel, or disconnect the panel and place it on an EnderIO tank to fill up.  Be careful not to run out of Nutrient Distillation, or you will have to open your chest manually until you fill it up again.

betterquesting.name: Extreme Crafting At Its Finest
betterquesting.desc: The end is just the beginning.  Once you have freed the world of some of the weaker Titans, you may need some help to get further.  The Extreme Crafting system along with the Titan Rune Trade Ins will push you to the next level.  You can craft or trade for creative items, hard to get materials, and all of the tools you need to achieve greatness and fend off the remaining Titans.

betterquesting.name: Singularity?  But You Need So Many Of Them
betterquesting.desc:
The researchers back home have supplied us with a new schematic.  A machine that focusses Titan Energies into condensed matter.  In less nerdy terms, this compresses ores and minerals into Singularities, which are extremely powerful crafting materials needed to make the most extreme of items and tools.

§6Tip:  The Nuetron Collector very slowly sucks Nuetronium from the atmosphere and condenses it into pellets, which can be used in Extreme Crafting.

betterquesting.name: Bringing the Rocky Mountains To Your Door
betterquesting.desc: Just like the Igneous Extruder can create Stone, Cobblestone, and Obsidian using it's internal tanks, the Glacial Precipitator can make Snowballs, Snow, and Ice in it's internal tanks.  Another step in fully automating your processes.  This is a key function for automating the prodution of Gelid Cryotheum.

betterquesting.name: A Furnace Like No Other
betterquesting.desc:
The redstone furnace combines the flexibility of the EnderIO Smelter with the Speed of the IC2 Furnace.  It is, as usual, very easy to automate the input and output of all items.

§6Pro Tip:  Certain upgrades can change the function of a machine completely.  This Redstone Furnace reward makes the furnace ONLY process food items... but you gain additional speed and output.  Great for automating a Culinary Generator from things like Wheat/Toast.

betterquesting.name: Expansion Your Horizons
betterquesting.desc:
Thermal Expansion is about integrating processes between mods, and optimizing the performance of machinery.  The machine are all highly automatable and upgradeable.

§6Tip: Florbs are like fluid grenades.. throw them to create a source block of that liquid at the landing area.  Great for bridging over pools of lava or water.... or killing groups of huddled mobs.

betterquesting.name: Plates and More Plates
betterquesting.desc: The compactor is a fast and convenient way to automate the processing of, you guessed it, compressed items.  Most commonly, this will be plates.  These plates are also cross-compatible with the IC2 plates and can be used interchangeably.

betterquesting.name: Trashcan Smashcan
betterquesting.desc: The Nullifier is not unlike a trash can.  BUT!  It is a fancy, more expensive trash can that is sure to wow your friends.

betterquesting.name: Pulverier Power
betterquesting.desc: Not unlike the Sag Mill from Ender IO the pulverior breaks down ores into a fine dust power.  This process doubles the ore output and can even uncover secondary ore drops.

betterquesting.name: Such a Sap
betterquesting.desc:
You can now harvest the inner juices of Trees to produce glue and rubber like substances that can be used interchangeably with other mods.  Simply place the Arboreal Abstractor next to a tree, and it will slowly suck the sap from within the logs.  Not all trees have sap to suck, but count on most vanilla ones being compatible.

§6Tip:  Resin from trees can be processed into Rosin, which will substitute for Rubber in most cases... allowing you to make things like Conduit Binder, Cables, and Cable Insulation.

betterquesting.name: They Can Clone Anything Nowaday
betterquesting.desc: The Phytogenic Insolator Growth Chamber is a way to automate the growth of crops without ever tilling a piece of soil.  It can duplicate and grow seeds, saplings, and/or their drops using state of the art fertilizer and RF.

betterquesting.name: Induction To Industry
betterquesting.desc: The induction smelter is the Thermal Expansion version of the Alloy Smelter.  Able to create alloys of multiple types of materials quickly, and upgradeably.

betterquesting.name: Upgrade the Machine That Upgrades Machines
betterquesting.desc: As if the speed upgrades weren't enough, you can also speed up the processing rate of the machines surrouding these Thermal Mediators.  They are like AOE Effect Time Machines.

betterquesting.name: Filler Up!
betterquesting.desc: The Fluid Transposer is your one stop shop for infusing liquids to and from items.  Turn a snowball into a cryogenically  treated Cryotheum compound... turn sand into Nether Stone... or... just fill a bucket with water.  This machine can do it all.  Make sure to check the in-GUI recipes for a list of all of the amazing things.

betterquesting.name: Water Way To Go
betterquesting.desc: If you need to automate the collection of water, but do not have an endless source available, the Aqueous Accumulator will slowly collect water from the air and store it in its internal tank.  If you place water along the sides of the accumulator it will collect water much quicker, without draining the blocks on the side.

betterquesting.name: Fractioning, I Was Never Good At Math
betterquesting.desc: The Fractioning Still seperates the small molecules of solid material from the liquid compounds pulled from natural sources.  Crude Oil, Resin, and Tar are similar components.  This allows for the materials to be processed into different, more useful items.

betterquesting.name: With Great Power, Comes Great Responsibility
betterquesting.desc: All machines in Thermal Expansion can be upgraded to multiple tiers.  This will allow them to have an increased number of upgrades.  Upgrades are also more powerful depending on the tier of machine they are in.

betterquesting.name: Let Me Upgrade Ya
betterquesting.desc: Speed Upgrades will make your machines faster and more efficient, but they will also come at the price of increased energy usage.

betterquesting.name: Up Up And Away
betterquesting.desc: Congratulations on your new airship.

betterquesting.name: Better With Baubles
betterquesting.desc: Baubles are trinkets that offer potion effects for as long as they are equipped.  These trinkets are equipped in your Inventory screen and run on an energy called BSU.  BSU is generated in the machine called an Experience Generator.  It does exactly what it sounds like... it generates BSU using your player experience.

betterquesting.name: Shake What Your Mama Gave Ya
betterquesting.desc:
You are given a wide variety of ways to deal with the mobs you face in Craft Of The Titans.  There is no fight that should pose much of a problem, if you have exhausted all of your resources.  If you find yourself consistently dying, run through the checklist of options you have to build a better defense:

§6Heart Cannisters - §fHeart Crystals increase your base health.  This is the most straitforward way to increase your ability to survive.  
§6Off Hand Weaponry -§f This pack gives you the option to dual wield.  Combat is balanced around your ability to either wield two weapons, or wield a weapon with a Shield.  Shields should not be overlooked, as there are some special shields available through quests that offer traits such as Thorns XXX or Knockback XX.
§e§e§6Baubles and Enchants -§f  Baubles are permanent potion effects tied to trinkets you can view in your inventory screen.  They cover nearly all aspects of defensive and offensive buffs.  Similar to Inventory Pets, they require maintenance in the form of BSU.  
§a§e§6Magic -§f Magic is not everyone's cup of tea.  But it can provide immense benefits to those who are open minded enough to give it a try.  Lightning Barriers, Walls of Fire, Typhoon Winds to push your enemies back, Summoned Minions to fight for you.  A little known fact is, there are spells in this pack, that with the proper tuning, can one shot any single boss in the game.  Will you attune your wizardry enough to find them?
§aIf you have restricted yourself to only using one or two of these defensive tools, expect to struggle in certain areas of this modpack.

betterquesting.name: For Some Reason, This Feels Dirty
betterquesting.desc: In order to get your Experience into the Experience Generator, you must "deposit" it into an Experience Stuff(er).  Then place the stuffer into the machine.

betterquesting.name: Jewelry Is Always The Right Gift
betterquesting.desc:
Currently, Baubles come in three slot types.  Belt, Ring, and Pendant.  Each slot can have only the specific traits allowed in those slots.  You can not wear double accessories of any sort.  Wearing two rings, for example, will cause both to fail.

§6The Belt Traits Are:
§aHighStep Upgrade - §fYou can walk on 1 block without jumping.
§aS§apeed Upgrade -§f Increases players speed.
§aJump Upgrade -§f Increases players jump height.
§aFlying Upgrade -§f Gives creative fly to a player.

betterquesting.name: The Bauble Breaker
betterquesting.desc:
If you make a mistake or feel as though its time for a change, you can remover certain traits from your baubles using the Upgrade Extractor.  Simply click the block while having the bauble in your hand.  

§6Tip: §f You can occassionally find Upgrade Extractors in village huts if you can't afford the materials to craft your own.

betterquesting.name: Then You Shoulda Put a Ring On It
betterquesting.desc:
§6The Ring Slot Traits Are:
§aInvisibility Upgrade - §fGains invisibility.

§aNight Vision Upgrade -§f Gives permanent nigh vision.

§aHaste Upgrade - §fFast mining.

§aPower Upgrade - §fMORE DAMAGE!!!

§aPlant Acceleration Upgrade - §fIncrease plants growth speed.

§aStuff Repairing Upgrade - §fRepair your tools and armor.

betterquesting.name: Shouldn't They Be Called Neckgolds?
betterquesting.desc:
§6The Traits for the Necklace Slot Are:
§aFire Immune Upgrade - §fYou can swim in lava and absorb any fire damage.

§aFall Damage Immune Upgrade - §fYou can't get damage from falling.

§aWither Immune Upgrade -§f Wither debuff can't be applied to you.

§aWater Breathing Upgrade - §fYou can breath underwater.

§aHealth Regeneration Upgrade -§f Slowly regenerates health.

betterquesting.name: Dragon Me To Hell
betterquesting.desc:
While some of us prefer the dependability of an airship,  when the going gets tough, there is nothing better than some "fire power" between your legs.  Rare dragon species have been spotted in locales around the overworld.  If you could only harness their power for your own, who knows what kind of mayhem you can bring about.  Scour the plains/deserts for Fire Dragons, and the coldest biomes for Ice Dragons. §3§a Find their roosts, noticeable as charred or frozen craters of dishevled earth, with patches of Gold and Silver treasure scattered about.  Bring back some of the roost materials. 

§6Tip:  Not all of the Dragons on this modpack are combat ready.  Some are specifically for transportation (Dragon Mounts Mod) while others can spit magical breathe attacks (Fire and Ice mod).

betterquesting.name: FUS RO DAH!
betterquesting.desc:
Before you can tame a Dragon of your own, you will need to study their biology, find out how to breed them, what to feed them, and how to hatch their eggs.  Hunt a few dragons, slice them up and retrieve their flesh... this should tell us what we need to know.

§6After you kill a dragon, it's body will not dissappear.  You must lay your hands upon the sacred beast (right click a few times) to initiate the final destruction, allowing him to pass on (and drop it's loot).

betterquesting.name: WHO'S THE MASTAH!  SHO NUFF!
betterquesting.desc:
Dragons are tamed from obtaining an egg from a stage 4 or 5 dragon.  Eggs can then be hatched by heating with fire (fire dragon), or freezing in a block of ice (ice dragon). You will then have to raise the baby to adult hood. Be cautious however abuse of your dragon may result in it going rogue.  The Dragons slowly grow over time;  Each stage marks a change in dragon's color, horn size, eye shape, diet and abilities.  The ability to fly starts at stage 3, while they develop their characteristic  fire/ice breath at stage 2.

§6Tip:  At younger stages dragons will only eat rabbits and chickens, and as they grow so will the size and quantity of meal requirements. As dragons go up in rank they unlock new abilities and/or their previous abilities increase in strength. The final dragon rank is 
stage 5 which are truly monstrous in size. Only the best Dragon hunters go after those.

betterquesting.name: O'Dragon Where Art Thou
betterquesting.desc:
Dragons can be found sleeping in caves surrounded by treasure or out hunting for food in their home biome. Fire Dragons are found in extreme hills while Ice Dragons can be found in ice plains and ice spike plains.  Explore underground caves thoroughly, and you may ceom across a Dragons Den with Dragon Eggs laying about.

§6Tip:t There are 8 different colors of Ice and Fire dragons and their eggs.  Four of each element.  Can you find them all?

betterquesting.name: Jetpack to the Future
betterquesting.desc:
Top Tier Jetpacks as you may know them, are not readily available until late game.  There are numerous means of flight up to that point.  However, if you find that you simply can not complete a particular task, you can craft a§6 One Time Use jetpack.§f These jetpacks will come out of the crafting table fully charged.  You can use them for as long as they hold their charge, but they will not accept any more RF.  Use them sparingly, as each one may only last for about 10-15 minutes of flight.

§aTip:  Make sure you are exploring the numerous dungeons throughout the world, there are many extremely valuable items that can be obtained, the further you get in the dungeon.  One Time Use Jetpacks can be obtained in this manner as well.

betterquesting.name: Whats This Got To Do With Arming Myself
betterquesting.desc:
Although not exactly as critical to combat as armor, buffs, and enchants... teleportation around the world, base, and between dimensions is key to being where you need to be, when you need to be there.
You will die.  Most likely in an unexpected romp around a dangerous dungeon corridor.  You can either make the long trek back to where you were exploring... or use a teleporter, if you thought ahead. 
§6 If you plan on going out mining, exploring, or to another dimension, it's always a good idea to take a teleporter, and a Ender Shard inside of your Ender Pouch.  So when you die, and respawn at your base, you can pull the Ender Shard out of your Ender Chest, place it into the Teleporter, and head back to where you came from.

betterquesting.name: Ender Sharts... er... Shards
betterquesting.desc: Ender Shards Hold The Coordinates of whatever location you Shift+Right Click.  You can either select a ground location, or another teleporter.  It works between dimensions as well.  Once the shard has locations, you can Right Click the shard into a Teleporter.  Whenever you Sneak on that teleporter, it will take you to the location on the Shard.  This will allow you to set up a network of teleports around your base, and the world.

betterquesting.name: The Beginning Of The End
betterquesting.desc:
You have mastered the dark arts, refined your blade, and conquered many of the Titans that stood in your path.  It's time to slam the nail in the coffin for the remaining Titans, and secure your name in the Stars.

It's time to begin Extreme Crafting.  This will put your build to the test.  Your automation will need to be efficient, your determination will need to be steady... but in the end, you will be §aUNSTOPPABLE.

betterquesting.name: Out With The Old, In With The Nuetrons
betterquesting.desc:
Neutronium particles make up everything around us. They are nearly intangible and microscopic in their stature. You must harness this power in a time consuming but worthwhile process called Neutronium Collection.  Neutronium Collectors simply gather the microscopic Nuetronium particles from our surroundings, and once it has enough, produces a pile of neutrons.  This can of course be upcrafted into nuggets, ingots and blocks for the creation of unbelievelable items.
§6Tip:  Though they are expensive machines, it is wise to make as many Nuetronium Collectors as possible, as there is no ability to upgrade the machine's speed.

betterquesting.name: Dressed To Compress
betterquesting.desc: Begin your route to Extreme Crafting aptitude by crafting this Singularity.

betterquesting.name: The Sum Of It All
betterquesting.desc:
Singularities are the elemtnal representation of the different materials found on our world.  They are created by fusion compressing massive amounts of material samples down into the pureset form.  These singularities allow us to harness power in our tools, machines, and armors that were never possible before.
§6Tip:  The Nuetronium Compressor will accept any of the 10 base materials in BLOCK form only.  It takes 512 blocks of material in order to create one Singularity. Your progress on each singularity is represented in the GUI of the Compressor.  You may want to have multiple compressors running from an auto-import system... as once you put a certain material into the compressor, the machine can not switch materials until the singularity is complete.

betterquesting.name: Dressed To Compress
betterquesting.desc: Begin your route to Extreme Crafting aptitude by crafting this Singularity.

betterquesting.name: Dressed To Compress
betterquesting.desc: Begin your route to Extreme Crafting aptitude by crafting this Singularity.

betterquesting.name: Dressed To Compress
betterquesting.desc: Begin your route to Extreme Crafting aptitude by crafting this Singularity.

betterquesting.name: Dressed To Compress
betterquesting.desc: Begin your route to Extreme Crafting aptitude by crafting this Singularity.

betterquesting.name: Dressed To Compress
betterquesting.desc: Begin your route to Extreme Crafting aptitude by crafting this Singularity.

betterquesting.name: Dressed To Compress
betterquesting.desc: Begin your route to Extreme Crafting aptitude by crafting this Singularity.

betterquesting.name: Dressed To Compress
betterquesting.desc: Begin your route to Extreme Crafting aptitude by crafting this Singularity.

betterquesting.name: Dressed To Compress
betterquesting.desc: Begin your route to Extreme Crafting aptitude by crafting this Singularity.

betterquesting.name: Dressed To Compress
betterquesting.desc: Begin your route to Extreme Crafting aptitude by crafting this Singularity.

betterquesting.name: Infinity Armor
betterquesting.desc: Infinity Armor is THE most poweful armor in the game.  Is it necessary to beat all of the Titans?  No.  But we didn't come to this land just "barely" conquer our enemeis.  This armor pretty much makes you immune to everything, including piercing and void damage.  It has numerous built in enchants such as Speed and Nightviosion.

betterquesting.name: Helpful Tidbits
betterquesting.desc:
You will come acrossed yellow Artifact bags throughout your travels (dungeons).  These contain pre built spells and other goodies for you to use.  Some of the spells are weak... dealing miniscule amountf of damage... but good for beginners who are still levelling up.  Some spells are very strong, costing large amounts of mana, but able to bring down the heftiest enemies in a single cast.  These are just sample spells, and don't come anywhere close to the variety of spells you have at your disposle once you begin learning the Arts.
§6You may want to set up a testing area for spells that you create, or that come from an artifact bag.  Place dummies within a few blocks of each other, so when you cast a spell on one, it will tell you if the spell does Area damage, or single target. §a A spell may seem week, until you realize it covers an entire chunk worth of enemies.  Be aware, some spells such as "Dig" will destroy blocks, so use them with caution.

betterquesting.name: Like a Toolbox, for Spells
betterquesting.desc:
Instead of having spells clutter up your toolbar, the Spell book will allow you to store spells inside of it.  You can then cast spell simply by using it while its in your hand.  You can cycle through which spell will be cast upon use, by Shift+Scrolling.  There is a small hotbar in the top left of the screen which shows you the spell you have cycled to.

§aTip:  As you cast spells of different elements, you will begin to gain "affinity" towards that element.  Having a high affinity in a particular element has benefits and penalties.  The most important being a reduction in the mana cost per spell.  Use Affinity Tomes, found in Artifact Bags, to boost your affinities in whichever element you desire.

betterquesting.name: Dragons... It's always the Dragons.
betterquesting.desc: The Baubles Stuff upgrade stones are crafted from stone that has been imbued in Dark Energy, along with a few other easier to retrieve materials.  You can also find  bauble components, upgrade stones, and papers in dungeon chests.

betterquesting.name: Flim Flam Flozzel
betterquesting.desc: Due to the lack of Phosphorous Mandate Sulfur Boilluon, diamonds are not at plentiful on this world.  The good news, is you can create diamonds from compressig enough coal.  The process can take a bit of time, so you may want to start figuring out your automation now, so you don't find yourself in a pinch for diamonds later.

betterquesting.name: The Old Gods
betterquesting.desc:
Some elders still tell fantasy lore of The Old Gods... the rulers before the Titans.  In fact, it was The Old Gods that brought the Titans into being... according to lore, that is.  §a        
 §b   They claim the old god's were mythical beasts representing the interests of each of their factions.  One Old God in particular, the §6Great Dragon Brahemic§b, was cunning and slick in nature.  He was a masterful tactician, and a devious opponent.  He sought power, and grew unwilling to share the rulership of the galaxy with the other Old Gods. 

§aWe need to find out more about what happened.  §SHunt down 3 Scout Dragons and bring their§f scales back here for study.  Should you have too much trouble finding them, we have devised a§c recipe to create a summoning egg for Scout Dragons in JEI.

betterquesting.name: Spectral Dragons
betterquesting.desc: The ghaslty remnants of the thousands of Dragon Spirits still lingers in the world today.  Help us put them to rest, and allow them to have peace once and for all.

betterquesting.name: TPS Distress
betterquesting.desc: The mod associated with this quest line had to be removed to improve pack performance.  An alternate questline will be developed in a future update.

betterquesting.name: TPS Distress
betterquesting.desc: The mod associated with this quest line had to be removed to improve pack performance.  An alternate questline will be developed in a future update.

betterquesting.desc: The mod associated with this quest line had to be removed to improve pack performance.  An alternate questline will be developed in a future update.

betterquesting.name: TPS Distress
betterquesting.desc: The mod associated with this quest line had to be removed to improve pack performance.  An alternate questline will be developed in a future update.

betterquesting.name: TPS Distress
betterquesting.desc: The mod associated with this quest line had to be removed to improve pack performance.  An alternate questline will be developed in a future update.

betterquesting.name: Forgiven, But Not Forgotten
betterquesting.desc:
Sickened over her own conscience, and now understanding that she was lead astray by Brahemic, Lieutenant Ju' Li Sioux vanquished herself into a deep hibernation, never to awaken.
If has fallen upon you to awaken the Dragon using the §7§6Ju' Li Sioux reincarnation egg§f, and retrieve the Aluna Mara God Essence.  Using the God Essence you should be able to forge the catalyst to bring forth the§6 Old God Titan Brahemic§f, and right the injustice that has befallen the universe.

Don't expect any mercy from Ju' Li when she awakens.

betterquesting.name: The Large Craters Around The World
betterquesting.desc:
A happy ending eluded Silaqui Greyhawke, as she soon realized, Lieutenant Ju' Li Sioux was hot on her trail.  The two Dragon Flight Titans engaged in a fierce battle that bombarded the earth with debris from the heavens. §6Deep Craters that still scar the world today, formed across the face of the landscape§f as the two behemoths brought the wrath of the Old God's down with every blow.
  Despite the most honorable efforts, Silaqui Greyhawke proved to be no match for Ju' Li Sioux in the end.  In her last dying breathe she grasped at Ju' Li and whispered these undeniably haunting words... "Stakvik di jon"... or in common tongue "Ascend in honor".  As Ju' Li pried the §bAluna Mara Old God Essence§f from the dying Silaqui Greyhawke's clutch, she was stricken with unbelievable guilt.

betterquesting.name: Brah, Really Though?
betterquesting.desc:
As The Hardened Ju' Li Sioux became humbled and softspoken in the last few moments she sat dying at your feet, she began to recount to you the manner in which she was lead astray.  Though she had spent centuries as a pure and untainted dragon of morality, the wiley and cunning§6 Brahemic§f used his guile to woo her into his dark grasp.  She was spellbound by his dragonly gaze, bulging musculature,  and faint smell of Old Spice.

§9§b.... You interuppt Ju' Li, reminding her to stay on track.

§f"Some times the best choice, is to make no choice." She says, as her claws begin to weakin their grip on your hand.  The §6Aluna Mara§f tumbles out from underneath her left breast.  And for a moment you ponder......  how long it had been under there?... like, did she go through the entire battle with that thing under her breast?  No matter... You grab the Aluna Mara and head home to study the artifact.

betterquesting.name: Dragon Nuts, Roasting On An Open Fire
betterquesting.desc:
As the day of ambush drew near, Brahemic and his loyal Lueitenants travelled to the center of the Sun, and began conjuring their Titan army.  Little did they know, the Old God loyalist§6 Silaqui Greyhwawke §fhad become weary of the activities she had witnessed between the top three ranking members of the Dragon Flight, and decided to warn the Other Old Gods. 
     As the Old Gods gathered to discuss the matter, they soon realized it was too late.  The hordes of Dark Titans were descending to battle.  In a last ditch effort to preserve the truth of the Old Gods, the counsil gifted Silaqui Greyhawke with a vial of God Essence known as the §6Aluna Mara.   §fThey quickly conjured a portal to Earth and cast Silaqui Greyhawke through just in time to save her from the burning fires that engulfed the Old God's sanctum.

§aIn order to Reincarnate the Dragon Titan Lueitenant Ju' Li Sioux, you must engulf the Dragon Nut in extreme heat, to produce a Reincarnation Egg.

betterquesting.name: The Uprising
betterquesting.desc:
With the scales you collected, more of the story has been unveiled...

The Old God Brahemic, sought to take full control of the known universe with his Dragon Fleet in tow.  He gathered his two trusted Leuitenants,§6 The Greater Tu' Nah, and Ju' Li Sioux §fto devise a plan in which he would over throw the other Old Gods and take the universe for his own.   They plotted the unthinkable... to conjure an army of Da§crk Titans, and ambush the Old Gods Sanctum in the sky.§f  The time was near...

We  need to find out more, while further information is being pulled from the scales, you must embark an a journey to §6reincarnate an Old God§f, and seek the truth... either through will, or through force.  In order to create the reincarnation catalyst, we will need the power of Titan Runes, and other mystical relics.

betterquesting.name: Oh How the Mighty Have Fall
betterquesting.desc: After countless hours of concentration, you were able to decipher the codex behind the Aluna Mara God Essence.  You would now be able to utilize it's power to§6 summon the Great Old God Titan Brahemic§f, and avenge the Dragon Flight's honor, and the sanctity of an Old God kingdom long forgotten.

betterquesting.name: Justice Rains From Above
betterquesting.desc: Summon the Great Old God Titan Brahemic and bring him to justice...

betterquesting.name: Would You Do It Again?
betterquesting.desc:
Brahemic was saddenly stoic when you approached him.  Barely willing to engage you in combat, he almost seemed defeated already.  His pride would pull him by the nap, and you could see in his eyes that he would give you what you fame for... either§6 Death or Honor§f.  As your sword plunged into his heart, you couldn't tell if his last breathe was of anger... or of regret.  Something told you it was the latter...

§aWhat began as a glorious adventure to uncover an exciting story of deciet and betrayal, has oddly left you feeling drained.  You can't help but to wonder if this universe would have been a different place, had Brahemic and his Dragon Flight not betrayed The Old Gods.  Would their be war, would their be famine... would you be foraging on this God forsaken new land so far away from your family?

betterquesting.name: The Warrior
betterquesting.desc: From a young age you trained in combat arts to become one of the most formidable opponents in your homeland.  Your peers no longer posed a challenge for you.  In preparation of your journey here, you have brought along your trusty Obsidian Armor and weapon set. Your fitness training has also granted you an additional fortification§6 Heart Cannister.

betterquesting.name: The Warlock
betterquesting.desc:
You were always an adept student of the Magical Arts, and now you will use those skills to bring these new lands under your control.  Your mage robes are weaved with§a Fire Protection lining to ward of pesky Fire Elementals§f, along with two spells. §6 "Launch"§f Will propel you into the air and provide you with slow fall, allowing you to glide a short distance to escape danger. §6"Fireflash"§f is a beginner level spell  useful for picking off chunks of health before engaging in melee combat.  

The more you use spells, the faster you will level up your magica abilities, giving you more mana to cast more and higher tier spells.

betterquesting.name: The Hunter
betterquesting.desc: It took 6 weeks for your homeworld authorities to track you down in the Himalayas and beg for your assistance on this mission.  You had been tracking wild Yetis there for the past 18 months, as a last ditch effort to find a single beast on earth that could prove a challenging hunt.  When the authorities told you of the powerful foes you would face, they need say no more... you were in.  Along with you came your your leather camo gear and your trusty§a Redstone Bow with Punch V§f, to knock enemies far away if they surive the first shot. You also fashioned a §6variety of traps to protect your base§f of operations.

betterquesting.name: The Engineer
betterquesting.desc: Who needs armor when machines do it better?  Your problem solving skills and ingenuity made you the top candidate on the recruitment list for this mission.  Quick thinking and the ability to create the tools you need to survive are the Engineer's strong traits.  Of the many gadgets you are accustomed to making, the§6 Solar Powered Turret Defense gun§f is your pride and joy.  It can use Cobble, Dirt, Clay, and many other "cheap" items as ammunition.  §fThe Reinforced stone will give you a head start on protecting your base or building a bunker to hold up in during blood moons.

betterquesting.name: Choose Your Path Wisely
betterquesting.desc:
In Craft Of The Titans you assume the roll of a modern day Pioneer, sent to new lands to secure resources for your war trodden homeland.  This new land is brewing with danger, at the pinnacle of which are the Titans.  The Titans are boss creatures that rule over the many dimensions, including The Abyssal Wastelands, the Overworld, The Nether, and The End.  You were selected for this journey due to the unmatched expertise you hold in your profession.  

§6Identify what profession your expertise stems from, and you will be given a set of tools that are best suited for your profession.

betterquesting.name: The Purist
betterquesting.desc: You will accept no tools, no armor, no goods.  A true purist at heart.

betterquesting.name: Dongely Doo Neighbor
betterquesting.desc: A dirt dongle is a great tool for clearing a base area at the beginning of your adventure.  It will create a large flat 50x50x4 square of dirt, clearing ANYTHING 25 blocks above it.  Be very careful to map out the location ahead of time, as clearing an area too close to a structure you want to keep, will end with it being destroyed.  Each Dirt Dongle has 4 uses, and is not craftable.  Use it wisely.

betterquesting.name: Warrior - Choose Your Path
betterquesting.desc: From a young age you trained in combat arts to become one of the most formidable opponents in your homeland.  Your peers no longer posed a challenge for you.  In preparation of your journey here, you have brought along your trusty Obsidian Armor and weapon set. Your fitness training has also granted you an additional fortification§6 "Heart Cannister."

betterquesting.name: OreDiction Friction
betterquesting.desc:
When so many mods come together to provide a seemless experience, there can some times be overlap in content.  To blend things together mods will integrate their ores into common groups called "Ore Dictionaries".  This allows same type ores from different mods tobe used interchangeably.  This can cause some slight discrepencies at times. §b The Forge Lexicon is a tool designed to allow you to switch an item between any of the similarly Ore Dictionaried items.§f  So, if you have an IC2 Copper Ingot, but a recipe calls specifically for a Tinker's Construct Copper Ingot, the book will swap the ingot type for you.  The book has an empowered self sufficient mode that can be toggled by the "V" key (check your keybinds if not).  
§a

betterquesting.name: Warlock - Choose Your Path
betterquesting.desc:
You were always an adept student of the Magical Arts, and now you will use those skills to bring these new lands under your control.  Your mage robes are weaved with§a Fire Protection lining to ward of pesky Fire Elementals§f, along with two spells. §6 "Regenerating"§f Will replenish your halth over a  short period of time.
anger.  §6"Fireflash"§f is a beginner level spell useuse spells, the faster you will level up your magica abilities, giving you more mana to cast more and higher tier spells."

betterquesting.name: Hunter - Choose Your Path
betterquesting.desc: It took 6 weeks for your homeworld authorities to track you down in the Himalayas.  You had been tracking wild Yetis there for the past 18 months, as a last ditch effort to find a single beast on earth that could prove a challenging hunt.  When the authorities told you of the powerful foes you would face, they need say no more... you were in.  Along with you came your your leather camo gear and your trusty§a Redstone Bow§f and Leather Armor.  And what good would a hunter be without his pet sidekick.

betterquesting.name: Engineer - Choose Your Path
betterquesting.desc: Who needs armor when machines do it better?  Your problem solving skills and ingenuity made you the top candidate on the recruitment list for this mission.  Quick thinking and the ability to create the tools you need to survive are the Engineer's strong traits.  Of the many gadgets you are accustomed to making, the§6 Solar Powered Turret Defense gun§f is your pride and joy.  It can use Cobble, Dirt, Clay, and many other "cheap" items as ammunition.  §fThe Reinforced stone will give you a head start on protecting your base or building a bunker to hold up in during blood moons."

betterquesting.name: Purist - Choose Your Path
betterquesting.desc: You have brought not tools, for you are one with nature.

betterquesting.name: Lets Try It Out
betterquesting.desc: Uranium and Yellorite are both Ore Dictionaried the same.  Using your new Forge Lexicon, produce some Yellorite ingots.

betterquesting.name: Quiet Man, Loud Gun
betterquesting.desc: Your revolver speaks for you in situations where words just won't solve the problem.  Shaders are ways to customize your revolver with a personal accent.

betterquesting.name: It Gets Even Better
betterquesting.desc:
Your default revolver can be further customized to suit your rigorous activities.  An extended magazine will allow you to fire more bullets before having to reload.  This customization must be attached to your revolver at the Engineer's Workbench.

§6Training dummies are great ways to get used to the different bullet types of your revolver.  Make sure to group more than one dummy so you can view Are of Effect damage.

betterquesting.name: Barrel O' Laughs
betterquesting.desc:
As you assemble the weapon which will spit the fire you deem appropriate, take care to note the difference between ammo types.  Some will give you a powerful kick against heavily armored opponents, while others spread shots, capable of taking out full groups at once.

§6Pro Tip:  The revolver makes up for it's slow fire rate and ammo requirement, with damage that will knock the socks off of mobs.

betterquesting.name: Up Close And Personal
betterquesting.desc: Some times the fight comes to you before you can draw your weapon.  In the case of melee combat, the revolver's Bayonet upgradew will allow you to dish out punishment as you make space between you and your attacker.

betterquesting.name: The Lawmans Workbench
betterquesting.desc:
The Engineer's Workbench will allow you to perform many mechanical tasks.  The most pertitent at the moment is the customization of "Justice" your new revolver. 

§6Tip:  The Workbench is where you apply upgrades to your revolver and also craft ammuntion. Some items require a blueprint.

betterquesting.name: Justice Assemble
betterquesting.desc:
Assemble your revolver and prepare to customize it according to your own taste.

§6Pro Tip:  Certain Ammo types work VERY well in certain situations.  Is a particular mob or Titan heavily armored?  Use the Armor Piercing bullets.

betterquesting.name: If That Wasn't Enough...
betterquesting.desc: As if the suped up damage of the revolver wasn't already punishing enough, the Amplifier Electron Tubes will add shock damage and a chance to stun the target on hit.

betterquesting.name: Know Your Ammo Options
betterquesting.desc:
Each type of Ammo Serves a purpose.  
§6Casull - §aThe most basic and cheapest of the ammo types.  Reliable damage §bvs. non armored opponents.
§6Buckshot Cartridge - §aAs the "Shotgun" cartridge, the buckshot fires multiple projectiles at short range.  §bMassive damage inflicted at close range §awhen the target is struck by multiple pieces.
§6Dragon's Breath - §aLike the Buckshot Cartridge, this bullet fires multiple projectiles at short range.  Though the direct damage is slightly lower, the enemies will be set on fire.  Great §bvs. Fire weak opponents.
§6Armor Piercing - §a Slightly less damage than the Casull, but packs the biggest punch §bvs. armored opponents.
§6Silver Bullets - §aExpensive to make, but the hardest hitting single target cartridge available.
§6Crystallized Will - §aYour skill in Blood Magic has allowed you to imbue bullets with the souls of previously defeated opponents.  These §bhoming bullets§a will steer towards the closest target and cause moderate to high single target damage.

betterquesting.name: Getting Started
betterquesting.desc: In Craft Of Titans you will be quickly thrust into a world of powerful enemies, exciting places to explore, and strong items to help you along the way.  This part of the guide will aid you in bypassing the usual start-of-world grind, and get you prepared to take on the Titans.

betterquesting.name: Ore and Farm Automating
betterquesting.desc:
In Craft Of The Titans you will need to balance your ability to provide power with the needs of your homeland.  In order to become stronger and face the enemies in your path, you will need the tools your homeland trades to you for care packages.  Care packages are very large orders of resources and goods which you transfer back home to your people.

Automated farms, mob grinders, ore processing, and power generation will test your ingenuity at every turn.

betterquesting.name: Generating Power
betterquesting.desc:
The End Game power options usually branch off between Large Solar Panel Arrays or Nuclear Reactor Setups.  While Nuclear Reactor setups can provide more robust power options, many players appreciate that you can start the Solar Panel energy system earlier in the game.

This section of the guide will introduce you to a few of the Power Options available at the MID-GAME level, since you will need to get your automation started, and you will not have access to the materials needed for End-Game energy options for a little while.

§3Pro Tip:  You are not expected to complete each branch of this part of the guide.  The goal is to have you select between Combustible Power (Coal, Oil, Etc..), Solar Power, or Kinetic (Windmills, Watermills, etc...).

betterquesting.name: CARE PACKAGE DAILIES
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Take To The Skies
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Rare Titan Trades
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Blood Magic Mastering
betterquesting.desc:
Through the practice of mystic arts and Blood Magic, you have the ability to cast spells, summon entities to fight by your side, and even shape the world around you.  With Ars Magica 2, you can create and customize your own unique spell systems.  With Blood Magic you can harness the very Life Essence of living beings to rain destruction down upon your foes.

This section of quests will deal with some of the customized benefits of Blood Magic that you have never seen before.

betterquesting.name: Fighting Back
betterquesting.desc: As you progress through Craft Of The Titans you will inevitably gain more land, resources, machines, and valuable.  The last thing you want is a breech in your main base and a nasty creeper explosion, inferno mob fire, or general griefing.  This section of the guide will walk you through the process of setting up efficient turret defenses around your base to keep the bad guys out.

betterquesting.name: Arming Yourself
betterquesting.desc:
You will undoubtedly pick up and craft countless pieces of armor throughout the game.  There are a lot of options, made even more difficult by the fact that pieces will level up with use.  So is it worth it to swap your current piece, that has a few great level up perks... for a new piece that offers more armor value?

This portion of the guide will focus on some of the end-game armor options.  In order to take on the nastiest of Titans, including the Chaos Dragons of the The End, you will need to outfit yourself in more than just a few scraps.  Some of the most powerful armor sets in the game are:

§4Blood Magic Bound Armor - Drains your pool of life essence in exchange for damage.

§3Armor Plus Ultimate Armor - Lots of buff effects and invulnerability.

§6Draconic Evolution - Drains your RF Charge in exchange for damage.

betterquesting.name: Uncommon Titan Trades
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Dragon You With Me
betterquesting.desc: Abyssalcraft is a deep and dark journey through dead wastelands to battle titans that rival any you've seen in Minecraft before.  While getting your foot in the door may seem easy at first, you will quickly notice that the mobs are challenging, smart, and beefy. §6 You will be handicapping yourself if you do not take full advantage of the offensive tools of this modpack.  AoE Spells, Healing Potions, Absorbtion enchants... all of these will be coveted tools if you plan to defeat the Abyssalcraft Titans with any sanity left.

betterquesting.name: Ars Kickin Magicka
betterquesting.desc:
There are only two "magic" mods in this pack.  They were chosen meticulously for a few reasons.  1)  They do not force you through a long line of boring research or grinding in order to progress.  2) They have practical and fun use in conquering the Titans. §a Ars Magica 2 follows these principles.  As early as your first day in game you can grab a a free pre-built spell from the quest chain, and use that level up your magic.  By the time you come back to continue working on Ars Magica, you have already gained enough levels to make the next steps a breeze.  
§6Do not be discouraged at some of the pitiful damage done by low level spells.  If you continue to progress, you will soon be wielding magic spells more powerful than any physical weapon you could use, able to KO dragons in a single cast.  You will NEED to use magic in order to beat some of the Titans, as they will shrug off damage from most other sources.

betterquesting.name: Expanding Thermally
betterquesting.desc: Thermal Expansion is a Mod that allows you to process and automate both solids and fluids in ways that you never imagined.

betterquesting.name: Extreme Craftables
betterquesting.desc: No Description
